Name: Vortex Flurry
Intro:
Upon a 3-Ping, Extra DMG Bonus of [Lotus - Flurry] increases by <color=#D91414>5%</color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — [Lotus - Flurry] pulls in surrounding enemies upon a 3-Ping.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — When casting [Lotus - Flurry] with a 3-Ping while the Signature is active, pressing and holding the Basic Attack button triggers Iaido - Deadly Slash, dealing 360% Lightning DMG.</color>

Name: Glow Lotus Blade
Intro:
When casting [Signature - Lotus Blade], Lucia: Dawn's Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#D91414>5%</color> for 10s. Its duration will reset every time it is triggered.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — Automatically recovers Signature Energy for 10s after casting the Signature.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — Energy of Lotus Blade will not be reduced when Lucia: Dawn is on standby.</color>

Name: Dragon Claw Spin
Intro:
Speed Attack - Dragon Claw Spin: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#D91414>All-out Attack</color>. Upon a successful Dodge, Pulao: Dragontoll will perform a powerful counterattack move <color=#D91414>Dragon Claw Spin</color>, launching the target into the air and strangling it with her legs before spinning and slamming it to the ground. Depending on the Rank of Pulao: Dragontoll, <color=#D91414>Dragon Claw Spin</color> will deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#D91414>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#D91414>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge, while dealing <color=#D91414>350%</color> Physical DMG to other surrounding targets.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#D91414>10%</color> faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: Enhanced Team

Name: Tango Chainblade
Intro:
Speed Attack - Tango Chainblade: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#D91414>All-out Attack</color>. Upon a successful Dodge, Roland: Flambeau will perform a powerful counterattack move <color=#D91414>Tango Chainblade</color>, grabbing the target with his Chain Blade and launching it into the air before slamming the target to the ground behind him. Depending on the Rank of Roland: Flambeau, <color=#D91414>Tango Chainblade</color> will deal Fire DMG equal to <color=#D91414>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#D91414>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge, while dealing <color=#D91414>150%</color> Fire DMG to other surrounding targets.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: Curtain Call
Intro:
Finishing Move - Curtain Call: When the target has an empty Finisher Gauge and is within the range of <color=#D91414>Curtain Call</color>, tapping Basic Attack will perform the Finishing Move <color=#D91414>Curtain Call</color>: Roland trips up the target and steps on it to fire at its head, immediately eliminating the target while knocking back surrounding enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>400%</color> Fire DMG.

Name: Enhanced Speed Attack
Intro: The landing spot can be adjusted with the left joystick after grabbing an enemy with Speed Attack - Tango Chainblade. Gains an Incinerating Orb. (8s cooldown; only 1 Incinerating Orb will be granted at a time by this effect.)

Name: Enhanced Speed Attack
Intro: The landing spot can be adjusted with the left joystick after grabbing an enemy with Speed Attack - Tango Chainblade. Gains an Incinerating Orb. (8s cooldown; only 1 Incinerating Orb will be granted at a time by this effect.)

Name: Enhanced Finishing Move
Intro: When Roland's chain blade or Technique Attack hits an enemy, tapping the Basic Attack button immediately will pull in enemies that are not in range of the Finishing Move and finish them off. After performing <color=#D91414>Finishing Move - Curtain Call</color>, he will swing his chain blade back and forth across the battlefield and fire 8 incendiary bombs the next time he exits the field, dealing a total of <color=#D91414>1600%</color> Fire DMG.

Name: Enhanced Finishing Move
Intro: When Roland's chain blade or Technique Attack hits an enemy, tapping the Basic Attack button immediately will pull in enemies that are not in range of the Finishing Move and finish them off. After performing <color=#D91414>Finishing Move - Curtain Call</color>, he will swing his chain blade back and forth across the battlefield and fire 8 incendiary bombs the next time he exits the field, dealing a total of <color=#D91414>1600%</color> Fire DMG.

Name: Enhanced Team
Intro: After any Uniframe in the team finishes an enemy, restores <color=#D91414>20%</color> of self max HP and increases Fire DMG of all Uniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for 15s.

Name: Enhanced Team
Intro: After any Uniframe in the team finishes an enemy, restores <color=#D91414>20%</color> of self max HP and increases Fire DMG of all Uniframes in the team by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for 15s.

Name: Bipolar Expansion
Intro:
Explosion DMG from [Infernal Shot]'s blasting round increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414><color=#D91414>5%</color>%</color></color>. The burning area created by [Infernal Shot] will inflict Burn on enemies for 3s. Enemies inflicted with Burn are considered to be in the burning area.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — When [Magnetic Shot] hits a target with Burn, extends the Burn status for 3s.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — When Lee: Palefire attacks an enemy inflicted with Burn, the Base DMG of [Infernal Shot]'s additional Extra DMG increases by 100%.</color>

Name: Center Axis Relock
Intro:
After casting [Controlling Bullet], Lee: Palefire's movement speed increases, and he enters <color=#D91414>Blasting Mode</color> for 5s, performing Continuous Fire with his Dual Guns at the target. DMG dealt by each shot is based on the number of Red Orbs pinged when casting [Controlling Bullet]. In this mode, Lee: Palefire deals Fire DMG instead of Physical DMG, and Fire DMG increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>5%</color></color>. Pinging orbs will grant extra effects:
 
Red Orbs: Extends <color=#D91414>Blasting Mode</color> by <color=#D91414>0.5/1/1.5</color>s based on the number of orbs pinged. Each shot deals DMG equal to the DMG dealt by the corresponding number of orbs pinged by [Precise Shots].
Yellow and Blue Orbs: Lee: Palefire dodges to the side when pinged, and <color=#D91414>Blasting Mode</color> extends by <color=#D91414>0.3</color>s.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — In Blasting Mode, each successful shot during Continuous Fire will grant 1 Energy. Energy gained from pinging orbs is doubled.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — In Blasting Mode, dodging will consume twice the amount of Dodge and trigger Evasive Shot: Lee: Palefire leaps into the air and quickly fires 11 times, gaining 21 Energy and dealing 45% Fire DMG with each shot. Gains Invincible during Evasive Shot. Successfully dodging with Evasive Shot will recover the extra Dodge consumed.</color>

Name: Center Axis Relock
Intro:
After casting [Controlling Bullet], Lee: Palefire's movement speed increases, and he enters <color=#D91414>Blasting Mode</color> for 5s, performing Continuous Fire with his Dual Guns at the target. DMG dealt by each shot is based on the number of Red Orbs pinged when casting [Controlling Bullet]. In this mode, Lee: Palefire deals Fire DMG instead of Physical DMG, and Fire DMG increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>5.59%</color></color>. Pinging orbs will grant extra effects:
 
Red Orbs: Extends <color=#D91414>Blasting Mode</color> by <color=#D91414>0.5/1/1.5</color>s based on the number of orbs pinged. Each shot deals DMG equal to the DMG dealt by the corresponding number of orbs pinged by [Precise Shots].
Yellow and Blue Orbs: Lee: Palefire dodges to the side when pinged, and <color=#D91414>Blasting Mode</color> extends by <color=#D91414>0.3</color>s.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — In Blasting Mode, each successful shot during Continuous Fire will grant 1 Energy. Energy gained from pinging orbs is doubled.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — In Blasting Mode, dodging will consume twice the amount of Dodge and trigger Evasive Shot: Lee: Palefire leaps into the air and quickly fires 11 times, gaining 21 Energy and dealing 45% Fire DMG with each shot. Gains Invincible during Evasive Shot. Successfully dodging with Evasive Shot will recover the extra Dodge consumed.</color>

Name: Center Axis Relock
Intro:
After casting [Controlling Bullet], Lee: Palefire's movement speed increases, and he enters <color=#D91414>Blasting Mode</color> for 5s, performing Continuous Fire with his Dual Guns at the target. DMG dealt by each shot is based on the number of Red Orbs pinged when casting [Controlling Bullet]. In this mode, Lee: Palefire deals Fire DMG instead of Physical DMG, and Fire DMG increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>11.18%</color></color>. Pinging orbs will grant extra effects:
 
Red Orbs: Extends <color=#D91414>Blasting Mode</color> by <color=#D91414>0.5/1/1.5</color>s based on the number of orbs pinged. Each shot deals DMG equal to the DMG dealt by the corresponding number of orbs pinged by [Precise Shots].
Yellow and Blue Orbs: Lee: Palefire dodges to the side when pinged, and <color=#D91414>Blasting Mode</color> extends by <color=#D91414>0.3</color>s.
 
<color=#0F70BC>·Lv.9 — In Blasting Mode, each successful shot during Continuous Fire will grant 1 Energy. Energy gained from pinging orbs is doubled.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>·Lv.18 — In Blasting Mode, dodging will consume twice the amount of Dodge and trigger Evasive Shot: Lee: Palefire leaps into the air and quickly fires 11 times, gaining 21 Energy and dealing 45% Fire DMG with each shot. Gains Invincible during Evasive Shot. Successfully dodging with Evasive Shot will recover the extra Dodge consumed.</color>

Name: Flaming Cyclone
Intro:
Deals Fire DMG with [Signature - 360° Shooting] instead. While casting [Signature - 360° Shooting], Fire DMG dealt by Lee: Palefire increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>5%</color></color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — Casting [Signature - 360° Shooting] will pull in surrounding enemies continuously.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — Hitting an enemy with [Signature - 360° Shooting] will inflict Burn for 3s, dealing Fire DMG based on the level of [Infernal Shot] every 0.5s. In Blasting Mode, the Base DMG of [Signature - 360° Shooting] increases by 40%.</color>

Deals Fire DMG with [Signature - 360° Shooting] instead. While casting [Signature - 360° Shooting], Fire DMG dealt by Lee: Palefire increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>7.94%</color></color>.
 
<color=#0F70BC>·Lv.9 — Casting [Signature - 360° Shooting] will pull in surrounding enemies continuously.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — Hitting an enemy with [Signature - 360° Shooting] will inflict Burn for 3s, dealing Fire DMG based on the level of [Infernal Shot] every 0.5s. In Blasting Mode, the Base DMG of [Signature - 360° Shooting] increases by 40%.</color>

Name: CA - Diamond Dust
Intro:
Speed Attack - CA - Diamond Dust: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#D91414>All-out Attack</color>. When Haicma: Starveil successfully dodges the attack in this way or is hit by an enemy's <color=#D91414>All-out Attack</color> during <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color>, she will amass Frost Wind and move it toward the direction of the joystick. Depending on the Rank of Haicma: Starveil, hitting the target who performed the <color=#D91414>All-out Attack</color> with her Frost Wind will deal Ice DMG equal to <color=#D91414>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#D91414>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge. Hitting other targets with her Frost Wind will deal <color=#D91414>150%</color> Ice DMG.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Depending on the Rank of Haicma: Starveil, hitting the target who performed the <color=#D91414>All-out Attack</color> with her Frost Wind will deal Ice DMG equal to <color=#D91414>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#D91414>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge. Hitting other targets with her Frost Wind will deal <color=#D91414>220.59%</color> Ice DMG.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#D91414>10%</color> faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Speed Attack - CA - Diamond Dust: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#D91414>All-out Attack</color>. When Haicma: Starveil successfully dodges the attack in this way or is hit by an enemy's <color=#D91414>All-out Attack</color> during <color=#D91414>Bitterfrost Level</color>, she will amass Frost Wind and move it toward the direction of the joystick. Depending on the Rank of Haicma: Starveil, hitting the target who performed the <color=#D91414>All-out Attack</color> with her Frost Wind will deal Ice DMG equal to <color=#D91414>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#D91414>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge. Hitting other targets with her Frost Wind will deal <color=#D91414>414.71%</color> Ice DMG.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#D91414>10%</color> faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#D91414>20%</color> faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: EX - Glacial Burial
Intro:
Finishing Move - EX - Glacial Burial: When the target has an empty Finisher Gauge and is within the range of <color=#D91414>EX - Glacial Burial</color>, tapping Basic Attack will have Haicma: Starveil suppress the target, annihilating it with her Scythe while dealing <color=#D91414>400%</color> Ice DMG to surrounding enemies.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Finishing Move - EX - Glacial Burial: When the target has an empty Finisher Gauge and is within the range of <color=#D91414>EX - Glacial Burial</color>, tapping Basic Attack will have Haicma: Starveil suppress the target, annihilating it with her Scythe while dealing <color=#D91414>1082.35%</color> Ice DMG to surrounding enemies.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#D91414>10%</color> faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#D91414>20%</color> faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: Enhanced Speed Attack
Intro: After casting <color=#D91414>CA - Diamond Dust</color>, Haicma: Starveil recovers <color=#D91414>250</color> Dodge while detonating Frost Wind, dealing an extra <color=#D91414>250%</color> Ice DMG to surrounding enemies.

Name: Enhanced Speed Attack
Intro: After casting <color=#D91414>CA - Diamond Dust</color>, Haicma: Starveil recovers <color=#D91414>250</color> Dodge while detonating Frost Wind, dealing an extra <color=#D91414>250%</color> Ice DMG to surrounding enemies.

Name: Enhanced Finishing Move
Intro: Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color> when <color=#D91414>EX - Glacial Burial</color> deals DMG to surrounding enemies. Haicma: Starveil enters Matrix after casting <color=#D91414>EX - Glacial Burial</color>.

Name: Enhanced Team
Intro: After any Uniframe in the team uses a Finishing Move, the Vanguard Skill effect of the next entering Uniframe increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>, and its duration extends by 15s.

Name: Enhanced Team
Intro: After any Uniframe in the team uses a Finishing Move, the Vanguard Skill effect of the next entering Uniframe increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>, and its duration extends by 15s.

Name: Predator's Charge
Intro:
Speed Attack - Predator's Charge: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#D91414>All-out Attack</color>. Upon a successful Dodge, Camu: Crocotta will lunge toward the enemy, slamming it to the ground to deal <color=#D91414>250%</color> Dark DMG and then launching it into the air to deal <color=#D91414>250%</color> Dark DMG. Depending on the Rank of Camu: Crocotta, <color=#D91414>Predator's Charge</color> will deal Dark DMG equal to <color=#D91414>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#D91414>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: Enhanced Speed Attack
Intro: After casting <color=#D91414>Predator's Charge</color>, Camu: Crocotta drags the enemy for an extra distance, dealing <color=#D91414>400%</color> DMG while pulling in surrounding enemies. Changes direction with the joystick.

Name: Enhanced Speed Attack

Name: Enhanced Finishing Move
Intro: The shockwave Camu: Crocotta unleashes after casting <color=#D91414>Fatal Shadow</color> deals an extra <color=#D91414>800%</color> Dark DMG, and he gains 3 stacks of Madness afterward. If he is in Berserk mode, gains 2 random Signal Orbs immediately.

Name: Enhanced Team
Intro: After any Uniframe in the team uses a Finishing Move, the Vanguard Skill effect of the next entering Uniframe increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>, and its duration extends by 15s.

Name: Enhanced Team

Name: Spiritual Prayer Dance
Intro:
[QTE - Heroic Dance] heals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>10%</color></color> more HP and grants <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> to the targets healed, increasing their Physical DMG Bonus by <color=#D91414>10%</color> for <color=#D91414>8s</color>. Its duration will reset every time it is triggered.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — [QTE - Heroic Dance] triggers an additional Light Penalty of Core Passive's level.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — [QTE - Heroic Dance] grants 12 Energy after triggering Light Penalty. [Passive - Field Reinforcement] New Effect: The effect of Ultralimit Torque increases to 20%.</color>

Name: Sacred Chain
Intro:
[Goddess Connection System] will trigger an additional Light Penalty upon a 3-Ping. After Light Penalty has been triggered <color=#D91414>4</color> times, the next Light Penalty triggered will become <color=#D91414>Divine Penalty</color>, dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>200%</color></color> DMG. [Passive - Pioneer of Glory] also increases Divine Penalty's DMG as it does to Light Penalty.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — [Goddess Connection System] has a 50% chance to trigger Light Penalty and the targets healed will be granted Ultralimit Torque.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — Liv: Luminance increases the CRIT DMG of the targets healed by 20%. Triggering Light Penalty and Divine Penalty will increase the next deployed character's CRIT Rate by 5% and 25% respectively for 10s until it reaches its maximum at 75%. [Passive - Pioneer of Glory] New Effect: Liv: Luminance gains 100 Energy upon entering the battlefield for the first time.</color>

Name: Divine Rage Field
Intro:
When [Signature - Arcadia Gate] is active, pinging orbs will trigger <color=#D91414>Light Penalty</color> <color=#D91414>1/2/3</color> times based on the number of Orbs pinged and it deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>15%</color></color> more Physical DMG.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — When [Signature - Arcadia Gate] is activated, nearby enemies will be pulled continuously and Divine Penalty's Base DMG increases by 10%.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — [Signature - Arcadia Gate] Liv: Luminance gains 40 Energy every time she enters the battlefield. When her Signature Move is active, she can be switched to other characters and exit the Signature Move state. [Passive - Consciousness Encouragement] New Effect: It lasts 15s and also applies to standby characters. Divine Penalty deals 25% more DMG.</color>

<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — [Signature - Arcadia Gate] Liv: Luminance gains 40 Energy every time she enters the battlefield. When her Signature Move is active, she can be switched to other characters and exit the Signature Move state. [Passive - Consciousness Encouragement] New Effect: It lasts 15s and also applies to standby characters. Divine Penalty deals 25% more DMG.</color>

Name: Viridescent Gust
Intro:
Speed Attack - Viridescent Gust: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#D91414>All-out Attack</color>. Upon a successful Dodge, Qu: Pavo will send Huiyu to grab the enemy. Depending on Qu's Rank, <color=#D91414>Viridescent Gust</color> will deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#D91414>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#D91414>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge. While casting Viridescent Gust, she will also generate a whirlwind that pulls in nearby targets and deals <color=#D91414>150%</color> Physical DMG. If Huiyu is already on the field when <color=#D91414>Viridescent Gust</color> is cast, its duration will be refreshed.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Depending on Qu's Rank, <color=#D91414>Viridescent Gust</color> will deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#D91414>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#D91414>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge. While casting Viridescent Gust, she will also generate a whirlwind that pulls in nearby targets and deals <color=#D91414>167.65%</color> Physical DMG. If Huiyu is already on the field when <color=#D91414>Viridescent Gust</color> is cast, its duration will be refreshed.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: Viridescent Gust
Intro:
Speed Attack - Viridescent Gust: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#D91414>All-out Attack</color>. Upon a successful Dodge, Qu: Pavo will send Huiyu to grab the enemy. Depending on Qu's Rank, <color=#D91414>Viridescent Gust</color> will deal Physical DMG equal to <color=#D91414>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#D91414>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge. Intro:
When Trailblade hits the target in Enhanced Shadow Form, it will leave two <color=#D91414>Shadow Blades</color> on the target and restore <color=#D91414>100</color> Dodge Gauge. Each Shadow Blade deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>60%</color></color> Dark DMG (up to 6 Shadow Blades can stack on each target).
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — When [Cosmic Wave] is triggered, its Base DMG increases by 50% for each additional Red Orb pinged. Base DMG of Trailblade increases by 20% in Enhanced Shadow Form.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — After dodging or pinging a Red Orb in Enhanced Shadow Form, press and hold Basic Attack to unleash Dark Blade that deals 150% Dark DMG for each Shadow Blade on the target. When the 6th hit of Dark Blade is triggered, its DMG increases to 300% and the duration of Enhanced Shadow Form extends by 2s.</color>

Each Shadow Blade deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>162.35%</color></color> Dark DMG (up to 6 Shadow Blades can stack on each target).
 
<color=#0F70BC>·Lv.9 — When [Cosmic Wave] is triggered, its Base DMG increases by 50% for each additional Red Orb pinged. Base DMG of Trailblade increases by 20% in Enhanced Shadow Form.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>·Lv.18 — After dodging or pinging a Red Orb in Enhanced Shadow Form, press and hold Basic Attack to unleash Dark Blade that deals 150% Dark DMG for each Shadow Blade on the target. When the 6th hit of Dark Blade is triggered, its DMG increases to 300% and the duration of Enhanced Shadow Form extends by 2s.</color>

Name: Fang-shattering Wolf
Intro:
Speed Attack - Fang-shattering Wolf: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete the Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#D91414>All-out Attack</color>. Upon a successful Dodge, Noan: Arca will rapidly travel across the battlefield to knock the enemy into the air, then slam it to the ground. Depending on the Rank of Noan: Arca, <color=#D91414>Lightning Blast</color> will deal Lightning DMG equal to <color=#D91414>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#D91414>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge. While casting this skill, Noan gains 1 Gear Level and pulls in surrounding enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>200%</color> Lightning DMG.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Depending on the Rank of Noan: Arca, <color=#D91414>Lightning Blast</color> will deal Lightning DMG equal to <color=#D91414>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#D91414>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge. While casting this skill, Noan gains 1 Gear Level and pulls in surrounding enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>505.88%</color> Lightning DMG.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#D91414>10%</color> faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge <color=#D91414>20%</color> faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: Voltaic Burst
Intro:
Finishing Move - Voltaic Burst: When the target has an empty Finisher Gauge and is within the range of <color=#D91414>Voltaic Burst</color>, tap Basic Attack to have Noan: Arca knock down the target and continuously rev his Rev Blade to trigger an explosion that executes the target. Also deals <color=#D91414>400%</color> Lightning DMG to surrounding enemies.

Name: Raging Surge
Intro:
<color=#D91414>Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon</color>'s Base DMG increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>5%</color></color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon also pulls in nearby enemies. After casting [Signature - Absolving Spear], the next low/mid-power electromagnetic cannon's Base DMG increases by 100%.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Low/Mid-power/Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon generates an extra 3 Signature Energy. After casting Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon, Rosetta: Rigor becomes Overloaded for 4s, during which all 3-Pings and Signature Move will receive the maximum Energy Point bonus. New effect of [Passive - Lance of Eternity] added: Lance of Perception inflicts Penetrating Pivot that reduces target's Physical Resistance by 5%.</color>

After casting Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon, Rosetta: Rigor becomes Overloaded for 4s, during which all 3-Pings and Signature Move will receive the maximum Energy Point bonus. New effect of [Passive - Lance of Eternity] added: Lance of Perception inflicts Penetrating Pivot that reduces target's Physical Resistance by 5%.</color>

Name: Eradication of Sins
Intro:
[Signature - Absolving Spear] has its Base DMG increased by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>5%</color></color> and also activates all available QTEs when cast.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Rosetta: Rigor recovers 10 Signature Energy each time she enters battle.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — When [Signature - Absolving Spear] is cast, press and hold Basic Attack to start charging. Rosetta: Rigor becomes invincible while charging and will fire a Low/Mid-power/Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon based on the charging time and whether she is in Full Burst Form. New effect of [Passive - Hyper-Burst] added: The Penetrating Pivot effect from Lance of Perception increases to 10%.</color>

<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Rosetta: Rigor recovers 10 Signature Energy each time she enters battle.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — When [Signature - Absolving Spear] is cast, press and hold Basic Attack to start charging. Rosetta: Rigor becomes invincible while charging and will fire a Low/Mid-power/Wide-area Electromagnetic Cannon based on the charging time and whether she is in Full Burst Form. New effect of [Passive - Hyper-Burst] added: The Penetrating Pivot effect from Lance of Perception increases to 10%.</color>

Name: Modulated Timbre
Intro:
Speed Attack - Modulated Timbre: Press and hold Dodge to continuously deplete the Dodge Gauge and dodge an enemy's <color=#D91414>All-out Attack</color>. Upon a successful Dodge, Selena will leap up to avoid the enemy's attack and then slash at a high speed. Depending on her Rank, <color=#D91414>Modulated Timbre</color> will deal Lightning DMG equal to <color=#D91414>6%/8%/10%/12%</color> of the target's max HP and deplete <color=#D91414>15%/20%/25%/30%</color> of its Finisher Gauge, while dealing <color=#D91414>350%</color> Lightning DMG to other surrounding targets.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 10% faster (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Reduces the Finisher Gauge 20% faster. (This does not apply to Speed Attacks and parries.)</color>

Name: Scorching Peril
Intro:
Base DMG and Healing of [Infernal Scorchmark] increase by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>10%</color></color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — After Vera is switched out, she performs Core Attack once to a random target within Night Field/Dark Field every 1.5s.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — Whenever Vera's Core Attack/Dark Night Slash hits an enemy marked by [Infernal Scorchmark] while Night Field/Dark Field is present, the mark will be removed, dealing Explosion DMG and performing Healing both equal to the full amount of the [Infernal Scorchmark] effect. [Infernal Scorchmark] spreads to another random enemy within range afterward.</color>

Name: Void of Darkness
Intro:
Upon casting the Signature Move with maximum Overclocking Points, Vera enters the <color=#D91414>Darkness Form</color>, dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>240%</color></color> Dark DMG to the surrounding area and creating a <color=#D91414>Night Field</color> afterward, which deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>60%</color></color> Dark DMG per second for 6s. She cannot gain Signature Energy and Overclocking Points while in <color=#D91414>Darkness Form</color>. Unleashing all <color=#D91414>Core Attacks/Dark Night Slashes</color> in <color=#D91414>Darkness Form</color> will activate <color=#D91414>[Signature - Dark Night's End]</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>800%</color> Dark DMG and ending the Darkness Form.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — Vera gains 80 Energy and a random Signal Orb when she enters the battle. Upon casting [Signature - Dark Night's End], all remaining Darkness Orbs are converted to Blue Orbs (max 3).</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — Creates a Dark Field immediately after casting [Signature - Dark Night's End].</color>

Name: Illusive Disruption
Intro:
Vera can perform <color=#D91414>Core Attacks</color> anytime while she is in <color=#D91414>Darkness Form</color>, and all Orbs are converted to Darkness Orbs. Pings Darkness Orbs to perform Dark Night Slash, dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>300%</color></color> Dark DMG.
Dark Night Slashes come with additional Dodge Calculation. Triggering the Matrix will grant 2 Darkness Orbs, and exiting <color=#D91414>Core Attacks</color> will turn Darkness Orbs back to normal Signal Orbs.
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.9 — Consecutive Dark Night Slashes deal increasing DMG, the Base DMG increasing by 0%/25%/50%/75% respectively.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>·Lv.18 — In Darkness Form, pinging a Signal Orb/Darkness Orb will increase the Base DMG of [Signature - Dark Night's End] by 50% (max 200%).</color>

Vera can perform <color=#D91414>Core Attacks</color> anytime while she is in <color=#D91414>Darkness Form</color>, and all Orbs are converted to Darkness Orbs. Pings Darkness Orbs to perform Dark Night Slash, dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>652.94%</color></color> Dark DMG.
Dark Night Slashes come with additional Dodge Calculation. Triggering the Matrix will grant 2 Darkness Orbs, and exiting <color=#D91414>Core Attacks</color> will turn Darkness Orbs back to normal Signal Orbs.
 
<color=#0F70BC>·Lv.9 — Consecutive <color=#D91414>Dark Night Slashes</color> deal increasing DMG, the Base DMG increasing by <color=#D91414>0%/25%/50%/75%</color> respectively.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>·Lv.18 — In <color=#D91414>Darkness Form</color>, pinging a Signal Orb/Darkness Orb will increase the Base DMG of [Signature - Dark Night's End] by <color=#D91414>50%</color> (max <color=#D91414>200%</color>).</color>

Name: Burning Hearts
Intro:
[Dancing Ring]'s Base DMG increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>5%</color></color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — [QTE - Molten Roundslash] also pulls in nearby enemies.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — [QTE - Molten Roundslash] also recovers 20 Signature Energy. New Effect of [Passive - Overload Outburst]: Grants Nanami: Pulse's Overload Outburst effect to characters on the field after casting [QTE - Molten Roundslash] for 8s. (The DMG dealt by that effect is based on Nanami: Pulse.)</color>

[Dancing Ring]'s Base DMG increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>10%</color></color>.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — [QTE - Molten Roundslash] also pulls in nearby enemies.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — [QTE - Molten Roundslash] also recovers <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy. New Effect of [Passive - Overload Outburst]: Grants Nanami: Pulse's Overload Outburst effect to characters on the field after casting [QTE - Molten Roundslash] for 8s. (The DMG dealt by that effect is based on Nanami: Pulse.)</color>

Name: Primordial Blast
Intro:
[Sawblade Storm]'s Base DMG increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>7.5%</color></color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — [Sawblade Storm] also pulls in nearby enemies and allows movement while performing this skill.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — After casting [Signature - Pulse], entering Overclocking State will not recover Signal Orbs. Nanami: Pulse gains Pulse Energy based on the level her Signature Move is cast to a maximum of 3. Press and hold Basic Attack to spend all Pulse Energy to unleash Fire Whirl, dealing 500%/1000%/1500% Fire DMG based on the number of Pulse Energy spent, during which Nanami: Pulse gains Super Armor. New Effect of [Passive - Thermal Growth]: DMG dealt by Fire Whirl increases by 10%. Nanami: Pulse gains 20 Signature Energy every time she is switched in.</color>

New Effect of [Passive - Thermal Growth]: DMG dealt by Fire Whirl increases by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Nanami: Pulse gains <color=#D91414>20</color> Signature Energy every time she is switched in.</color>

Name: Crimson Flow
Intro:
Gains 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Sword Heart</color> when performing a 3-Ping, max 2 stacks. When there is at least 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Sword Heart</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to consume 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Sword Heart</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Reverse Flash</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>150%</color> Physical DMG in total. Casting it outside <color=#D91414>Blade Will State</color> will give 1 random Signal Orb and re-arrange all the existing Signal Orbs in 3-Ping order.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — The Enhanced Form of Blue Orb Pings lasts 10s instead.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Base DMG of Reverse Flash increases by 100%. New Effect of [Passive - Crimson Scabbard]: Physical DMG increases for 8s instead. Yellow Orb 3-Pings will also trigger [Passive - Crimson Scabbard]. ([Passive - Crimson Scabbard] triggered by Red Orbs and Yellow Orbs do not stack.)</color>

<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Reverse Flash</color> increases by <color=#D91414>100%</color>. New Effect of [Passive - Crimson Scabbard]: Physical DMG increases for <color=#D91414>8</color>s instead. Yellow Orb 3-Pings will also trigger [Passive - Crimson Scabbard]. ([Passive - Crimson Scabbard] triggered by Red Orbs and Yellow Orbs do not stack.)</color>

Name: Will of Anatta
Intro:
While in <color=#D91414>Blade Will State</color>, press and hold Basic Attack to consume 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Sword Heart</color> to cast <color=#D91414>Reverse Flash</color>, during which a red glow will appear briefly. Release Basic Attack when the red glow appears to consume the remaining stacks of <color=#D91414>Sword Heart</color> and cast <color=#D91414>Sheathing Slash</color> to deal <color=#D91414>300%</color> Physical DMG. Becomes invincible when casting <color=#D91414>Sheathing Slash</color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Activates all available QTEs and recovers 15 Signature Energy when entering Blade Will State.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Base DMG of Sheathing Slash increases by 100%. New Effect of [Passive - Crimson Will]: Exiting Blade Will State will give 2 additional Blue Orbs instead of 2 random ones. Gains 35 Signature Energy when first deployed.</color>

Name: Abyssal Slash — Shredstorm
Intro:
While in <color=#D91414>Blade Will State</color>, press and hold Basic Attack after tapping Signature Move to consume 2 stacks of <color=#D91414>Sword Heart</color> and continuously consume <color=#D91414>Blade Will Orbs</color> (at least 1 <color=#D91414>Blade Will Orb</color>). When sheathing during the Signature Move, casts <color=#D91414>Wave Blast</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>175%</color> Physical DMG. Each extra <color=#D91414>Blade Will Orb</color> pinged will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Wave Blast</color> by <color=#D91414>50%</color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Each extra Blade Will Orb pinged will increase the Base DMG of Wave Blast by 100% instead.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Blade Will Orbs are consumed faster when pressing and holding Basic Attack after tapping Signature Move in Blade Will State. New Effect of [Passive - Abyssal Echo]: Physical DMG increases by 30% instead while under the Blue Orb's effect.</color>

Each extra <color=#D91414>Blade Will Orb</color> pinged will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Wave Blast</color> by <color=#D91414>50%</color>.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Each extra <color=#D91414>Blade Will Orb</color> pinged will increase the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Wave Blast</color> by <color=#D91414>100%</color> instead.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — <color=#D91414>Blade Will Orbs</color> are consumed faster when pressing and holding Basic Attack after tapping Signature Move in <color=#D91414>Blade Will State</color>. New Effect of [Passive - Abyssal Echo]: Physical DMG increases by <color=#D91414>30%</color> instead while under the Blue Orb's effect.</color>

Name: Thundering Clash
Intro:
- Base DMG of [Lightning Flash] increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>15%</color></color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>- Lv.9: Pulls in nearby enemies when casting [Lightning Flash].</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>- Lv.18: After a Red Orb 3-Ping, pinging Yellow Orbs will also activate Sniping Form. New Effect [Passive - Thunderbolt Streak]: Yellow Orb can be immediately pinged after a Red Orb 3-Ping. Veritas will dodge incoming attacks during this action.
New Effect [Passive - Gravitational Trap]: The effect of [Executioner] increases to 25%.</color>

- Base DMG of [Lightning Flash] increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>43.24%</color></color>.
 
<color=#0F70BC>- Lv.9: Pulls in nearby enemies when casting [Lightning Flash].</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>- Lv.18: After a Red Orb 3-Ping, pinging Yellow Orbs will also activate <color=#D91414>Sniping Form</color>. New Effect [Passive - Thunderbolt Streak]: Yellow Orb can be immediately pinged after a Red Orb 3-Ping. Veritas will dodge incoming attacks during this action.
New Effect [Passive - Gravitational Trap]: The effect of <color=#D91414>[Executioner]</color> increases to <color=#D91414>25%</color>.</color>

Name: Swift Archer
Intro:
- Base DMG of the lightning arrows fired in <color=#D91414>Sniping Form</color> increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>10%</color></color>. Base DMG of the lightning arrows fired in the Electro Charge Form increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>10%</color></color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>- Lv.9: After firing 3 lightning arrows in Sniping Form, holding Basic Attack can charge and launch 1/2/3 Terminating Arrows based on the charging duration and exit Sniping Form early. Each Terminating Arrow deals <color=#D91414>362.5%</color> Lightning DMG. While charging, Bianca: Veritas gains Super Armor. New Effect [Passive - Thunderous Illusion]: Blue Orbs can be immediately pinged after a Red Orb 3-Ping. Veritas will dodge incoming attacks during this action.
New Effect [Passive - Magnetic Chain]: The first enemy (except Boss enemies) hit by Bianca: Veritas's lightning arrow will be marked and immobilized until Veritas leaves Sniping Form or when the enemy dies. If the marked enemy is hit by the lightning arrow again, the immobilization effect will spread to nearby enemies that are not immobilized (except Boss enemies). This effect lasts 2.5s, and the duration will reset when the enemy is immobilized again.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>- Lv.18: After firing 6 lightning arrows or 3 Terminating Arrows to exit Sniping Form, launches [Reverberating Flash] to strike the locked target's location 6 times, dealing 600% AOE DMG in total. Bianca: Veritas becomes immune to DMG and Hit effects while casting [Reverberating Flash].
New Effect [Passive - Tapetum Viola]: The effect of [Fulminology] increases to 20%.</color>

<color=#0F70BC>- Lv.9: After firing 3 lightning arrows in <color=#D91414>Sniping Form</color>, holding Basic Attack can charge and launch <color=#D91414>1/2/3</color> Terminating Arrows based on the charging duration and exit Sniping Form early. Each Terminating Arrow deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>661.03%</color></color> Lightning DMG. While charging, Bianca: Veritas gains Super Armor. New Effect [Passive - Thunderous Illusion]: Blue Orbs can be immediately pinged after a Red Orb 3-Ping. Veritas will dodge incoming attacks during this action.
New Effect [Passive - Magnetic Chain]: The first enemy (except Boss enemies) hit by Bianca: Veritas's <color=#D91414>lightning arrow</color> will be marked and <color=#D91414>immobilized</color> until Veritas leaves Sniping Form or when the enemy dies. If the marked enemy is hit by the lightning arrow again, the <color=#D91414>immobilization</color> effect will spread to nearby enemies that are <color=#D91414>not immobilized</color> (except Boss enemies). This effect lasts <color=#D91414>2.5</color>s, and the duration will reset when the enemy is immobilized again.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>- Lv.18: After firing 6 lightning arrows or 3 Terminating Arrows to exit Sniping Form, launches [Reverberating Flash] to strike the locked target's location 6 times, dealing 600% AOE DMG in total. Bianca: Veritas becomes immune to DMG and Hit effects while casting [Reverberating Flash].
New Effect [Passive - Tapetum Viola]: The effect of [Fulminology] increases to 20%.</color>

- Base DMG of the lightning arrows fired in <color=#D91414>Sniping Form</color> increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>26.47%</color></color>. Base DMG of the lightning arrows fired in the Electro Charge Form increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>26.47%</color></color>.
 
<color=#0F70BC>- Lv.9: After firing 3 lightning arrows in <color=#D91414>Sniping Form</color>, holding Basic Attack can charge and launch <color=#D91414>1/2/3</color> Terminating Arrows based on the charging duration and exit Sniping Form early. Each Terminating Arrow deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>959.56%</color></color> Lightning DMG. While charging, Bianca: Veritas gains Super Armor. New Effect [Passive - Thunderous Illusion]: Blue Orbs can be immediately pinged after a Red Orb 3-Ping. Veritas will dodge incoming attacks during this action.
New Effect [Passive - Magnetic Chain]: The first enemy (except Boss enemies) hit by Bianca: Veritas's <color=#D91414>lightning arrow</color> will be marked and <color=#D91414>immobilized</color> until Veritas leaves Sniping Form or when the enemy dies. If the marked enemy is hit by the lightning arrow again, the <color=#D91414>immobilization</color> effect will spread to nearby enemies that are <color=#D91414>not immobilized</color> (except Boss enemies). This effect lasts <color=#D91414>2.5</color>s, and the duration will reset when the enemy is immobilized again.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>- Lv.18: After firing 6 lightning arrows or 3 Terminating Arrows to exit <color=#D91414>Sniping Form</color>, launches [Reverberating Flash] to strike the locked target's location 6 times, dealing <color=#D91414>600%</color> AOE DMG in total. Bianca: Veritas becomes immune to DMG and Hit effects while casting [Reverberating Flash].
New Effect [Passive - Tapetum Viola]: The effect of <color=#D91414>[Fulminology]</color> increases to <color=#D91414>20%</color>.</color>

Name: Signature - Lightning Bloom
Intro:
- Base DMG of [Signature - Ire of Lightning] increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>7.5%</color></color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>- Lv.9: Firing a lightning arrow in Sniping Form grants 4 extra Signature Energy. Each lightning arrow grants one extra Red Orb, up to 3 Red Orbs for each entrance.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>- Lv.18: Casting [Signature - Ire of Lightning] will move up to 3 Red Orbs to the front of the orb bar. New Effect [Passive - Reversed Arc]: Gains an extra 76 Signature Energy upon entering battle for the first time, and 18 Signature Energy for each entrance later.
New Effect [Passive - Thunderstruck]: The effect of [Greased Lightning] increases to 30%.</color>

Name: Thunderous Lunge
Intro:
Pinging before the Red/Yellow 3-Ping Skill ends to attach a <color=#D91414>lightning bolt</color> to the last Red/Yellow Orb hit. Pinging during a Blue 3-Ping to cast [Spear Lunge] immediately with an extra <color=#D91414>lightning bolt</color>. The <color=#D91414>lightning bolt</color> deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>150%</color></color>/<color=#D91414><color=#D91414>300%</color></color>/<color=#D91414><color=#D91414>450%</color></color> Lightning DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Gains 1 stack of Lightning Capacity upon a 3-Ping during a 3-Ping Skill, stacking up to 2 times. When [Spear Lunge] is triggered, all Lightning Capacity stacks are consumed, granting the same number of stacks of [Electric Charge].</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Each stack of Lightning Capacity consumed will restore 2 random Signal Orbs of the same color. New Effect of [Passive - Eternal Battlefield] added: Each stack of Lightning Capacity consumed will restore 16 Signature Energy.</color>

The <color=#D91414>lightning bolt</color> deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>238.24%</color></color>/<color=#D91414><color=#D91414>476.47%</color></color>/<color=#D91414><color=#D91414>714.71%</color></color> Lightning DMG based on the number of orbs pinged.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Gains 1 stack of <color=#D91414>Lightning Capacity</color> upon a 3-Ping during a 3-Ping Skill, stacking up to 2 times. When [Spear Lunge] is triggered, all <color=#D91414>Lightning Capacity</color> stacks are consumed, granting the same number of stacks of [Electric Charge].</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Each stack of Lightning Capacity consumed will restore 2 random Signal Orbs of the same color. New Effect of [Passive - Eternal Battlefield] added: Each stack of Lightning Capacity consumed will restore 16 Signature Energy.</color>

Base DMG of [Lightning Fall] with max stacks increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>42.35%</color></color>.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Vera: Garnet gains 20 Signature Energy when casting [Lightning Fall] for the first time after she is switched in. Casting [Lightning Fall] with max stacks will rearrange the Signal Orbs into 3-Pings.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — Extra DMG Bonus of [Lightning Fall] with max stacks increases by <color=#D91414>30%</color>. New Effect of [Passive - Unyielding Breacher]: The Turbulence Interference effect inflicted by Vera: Garnet increases by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.</color>

Name: Blazing Spear
Intro:
Vera: Garnet can ping an extra set of 3-Ping Orbs when casting [Signature - Shining Piercer] to end the skill early and cast <color=#D91414>Blazing Spear</color>, piercing the target, dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>1250%</color></color> Lightning DMG, and gaining 1 stack of Electric Charge. Afterward, she calls down lightning to deal <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>300%</color></color> Lightning DMG. New Effect of [Passive - Eternal Battlefield]: Vera can cast Lightning Fall immediately after <color=#D91414>Blazing Spear</color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Replenishes Signature Energy to 20 when casting a QTE if it's below 20. Casting [Signature - Shining Piercer] will activate all available QTEs.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Pinging an extra set of 3-Ping Orbs when casting Blazing Spear increases its Extra DMG Bonus by 50%. New Effect of [Passive - Goddess of War]: When casting Blazing Spear, each stack of [Electric Charge] increases its Base DMG by 30%.</color>

Name: Splendorous Rite
Intro:
Signal Orbs deal <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>15%</color></color> more Base DMG. Liv can immediately perform another ping during any ping but can't cast this continuously.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — The first Prayer Liv makes after entering the battlefield will rearrange the Signal Orbs into 3-Pings.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — When switched in, casts [Chaos Oath] and gains 12 Signature Energy and 12 Prayer. New Effect of [Passive - Hierophany]: After Liv casts [Chaos Oath] or [Purity Oath] through orb pings, full Prayer will automatically trigger [Divine Prayer].</color>

Name: Devout Promise
Intro:
Extra DMG Bonus of [Chaos Oath] and [Purity Oath] increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>10%</color></color>. Liv can cast [Signature - Sea of Sangharama] immediately after [Chaos Oath] or [Purity Oath].
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Pulls in nearby enemy units after casting [Purity Oath].</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Liv gains 1 set of random 3-Ping Orbs through the first Prayer she makes after entering the battlefield. Gains 24 Signature Energy after casting full stacks of any [Oath]. New Effect of [Passive - Martyrdom]: After pinging the 3rd set of orbs during [Empyreal Prayer], if there are still orbs of the set's color, pings up to 3 orbs of that color and grants a 5%/10%/15% Extra DMG Bonus to [Empyreal Oath] based on the number of orbs pinged.</color>

Name: Blessing and Retribution
Intro:
[Empyreal Oath] will generate Rain of Incineration, healing allies for <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>10%</color></color> ATK and dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>30%</color></color> Fire DMG to enemies within a large area every 0.5s for 5s.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — The 6 orbs granted by [Signature - Sea of Sangharama] are guaranteed to be 2 sets of 3-Ping Orbs and put at the front of the line.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Casts [Empyreal Oath] faster and activates all available QTEs during so. New Effect of [Passive - Revelation]: [Prayer Ripple] triggered during [Empyreal Prayer] deals 100% more Base DMG.</color>

[Empyreal Oath] will generate Rain of Incineration, healing allies for <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>15.88%</color></color> ATK and dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>47.65%</color></color> Fire DMG to enemies within a large area every 0.5s for 5s.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — The 6 orbs granted by [Signature - Sea of Sangharama] are guaranteed to be 2 sets of 3-Ping Orbs and put at the front of the line.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Casts [Empyreal Oath] faster and activates all available QTEs during so. New Effect of [Passive - Revelation]: [Prayer Ripple] triggered during [Empyreal Prayer] deals 100% more Base DMG.</color>

Name: Faint Light
Intro:
The Base DMG of pinging Signal Orbs increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>.
After casting [Comet Propulsion], Scire enters a combo preparation state. During this state, pinging Signal Orbs is considered a comet combo, granting Super Armor. Comet Combo 1: Deals <color=#D91414>100%</color>/<color=#D91414>200%</color>/<color=#D91414>300%</color> Dark DMG, rearranges Signal Orbs into 3-Pings, and triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown (upon successful trigger, randomly gains 1 Signal Orb). Comet Combo 2: Deals <color=#D91414>120%</color>/<color=#D91414>240%</color>/<color=#D91414>360%</color> Dark DMG. Comet Finish: <color=#D91414>150%</color>/<color=#D91414>300%</color>/<color=#D91414>450%</color> Dark DMG.
 
<color=#645F5D>At Lv.9: When pinging Signal Orbs during a comet combo, Scire will grant the team 120/240/360 electric charge; Comet Finish grants an additional 24/48/72 electric charge.
[Core Passive - Space Walk] New Effect: [Plasma Beam]:
- Effect Charge: Maximum electric charge is 1000 points.
- Effect Activation: The Plasma Beam effect character enters the Electric Storm Flash state, dealing 800% Plasma Beam DMG to nearby units every 2s (does not trigger Tank Class skills), lasting 12s.
New effect of [QTE - Dawn Fall] added: Deals 100% Plasma Beam DMG.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>At Lv.18: When pinging Red Orbs, Scire will gain an anti-gravity shield equal to 3%/6%/10% of her maximum HP.
New effect of [Passive - Faint Light Lv.2] added: While the anti-gravity shield exists, Scire gains a 15% ATK increase.</color>

- Effect Activation: The Plasma Beam effect character enters the Electric Storm Flash state, dealing <color=#D91414>800%</color> Plasma Beam DMG to nearby units every 2s (does not trigger Tank Class skills), lasting 12s.
New effect of [QTE - Dawn Fall] added: Deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Plasma Beam DMG.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>At Lv.18: When pinging Red Orbs, Scire will gain an anti-gravity shield equal to <color=#D91414>3%/6%/10%</color> of her maximum HP.
New effect of [Passive - Faint Light Lv.2] added: While the anti-gravity shield exists, Scire gains a <color=#D91414>15%</color> ATK increase.</color>

Name: Faint Light
Intro:
The Base DMG of pinging Signal Orbs increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>.
After casting [Comet Propulsion], Scire enters a combo preparation state. During this state, pinging Signal Orbs is considered a comet combo, granting Super Armor. Comet Combo 2: Deals <color=#D91414>338.82%</color>/<color=#D91414>677.65%</color>/<color=#D91414>1016.47%</color> Dark DMG. Comet Finish: <color=#D91414>423.53%</color>/<color=#D91414>847.06%</color>/<color=#D91414>1270.59%</color> Dark DMG.
 
<color=#0F70BC>At Lv.9: When pinging Signal Orbs during a comet combo, Scire will grant the team <color=#D91414>120/240/360</color> electric charge; Comet Finish grants an additional <color=#D91414>24/48/72</color> electric charge.
[Core Passive - Space Walk] New Effect: [Plasma Beam]:
- Effect Charge: Maximum electric charge is 1000 points.
- Effect Activation: The Plasma Beam effect character enters the Electric Storm Flash state, dealing <color=#D91414>800%</color> Plasma Beam DMG to nearby units every 2s (does not trigger Tank Class skills), lasting 12s.
New effect of [QTE - Dawn Fall] added: Deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Plasma Beam DMG.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>At Lv.18: When pinging Red Orbs, Scire will gain an anti-gravity shield equal to <color=#D91414>3%/6%/10%</color> of her maximum HP.
New effect of [Passive - Faint Light Lv.2] added: While the anti-gravity shield exists, Scire gains a <color=#D91414>15%</color> ATK increase.</color>

Name: Mass-Energy Conversion
Intro:
Each set of 3-Ping Signal Orbs consumed while charging [Leap Attack] increases the Extra DMG Bonus of this Leap Attack by <color=#D91414>8%</color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9: While charging [Leap Attack], it will pull in nearby targets and trigger Matrix if it is available.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18: Each set of 3-Ping Signal Orbs consumed while charging [Leap Attack] increases the Extra DMG Bonus of the next [Signature Move - Stardust Horizon] by 10%.
New effect of [Passive - Banishing Sunglow Lv.2] added: The Chain Fusion applied by Scire reduces the target's Dark Resistance by a further 10%.</color>

<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9: While charging [Leap Attack], it will pull in nearby targets and trigger Matrix if it is available.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18: Each set of 3-Ping Signal Orbs consumed while charging [Leap Attack] increases the Extra DMG Bonus of the next [Signature Move - Stardust Horizon] by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.
New effect of [Passive - Banishing Sunglow Lv.2] added: The <color=#D91414>Chain Fusion</color> applied by Scire reduces the target's Dark Resistance by a further <color=#D91414>10%</color>.</color>

Name: Vision Edge
Intro:
While in Anti-gravity Form or during Comet Combos, press and hold Basic Attack to cast [Shattering Strike], dealing <color=#D91414>240%</color> Dark DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>88 Signature Energy</color>. During this time, Karenina: Scire gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>30%</color> DMG Reduction.
- While in Anti-gravity Form, casting [Shattering Strike] additionally restores <color=#D91414>12 Signature Energy</color> and <color=#D91414>999 Kinetic Energy</color>. Each set of 3-Ping Signal Orbs consumed while charging [Leap Attack] increases the Base DMG of [Shattering Strike] by <color=#D91414>50%</color>.
- During [Shattering Strike] and the subsequent [Signature Move - Stardust Horizon], Scire is considered to be in Anti-gravity Form.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9: When the team's Electric Charge reaches its maximum, [Shattering Strike] will activate Electric Storm Flash state, deploying a Dissociation Electric Field for 14s.
 While in Electric Storm Flash state, casting [Signature Move - Stardust Horizon] will additionally cast [Signature Move - Starstream Electric Shock], dealing 900% Plasma Beam DMG.
- Dissociation Electric Field deals 75% Plasma Beam DMG once to targets caught within, and inflicts them with a Turbulence Interference effect every 2s, reducing their Lightning Resistance by 15% for 2s.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18: During the charge-up phase of [Shattering Strike], an additional set of 3-Ping Signal Orbs can be pinged to increase the Extra DMG Bonus of the subsequent release by 200%, activating all available QTEs, and granting the team 240 Electric Charge.
New effect of [Passive - Unquenchable Willpower Lv.3] added: The Extra DMG Bonus of [Shattering Strike] increases by 50%; the additional 3-Ping consumed during the charge-up phase will cause the next [Signature Move - Starstream Electric Shock] to deal double damage.</color>

Intro:
While in Anti-gravity Form or during Comet Combos, press and hold Basic Attack to cast [Shattering Strike], dealing <color=#D91414>395.29%</color> Dark DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>88 Signature Energy</color>. During this time, Karenina: Scire gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>30%</color> DMG Reduction.
- While in Anti-gravity Form, casting [Shattering Strike] additionally restores <color=#D91414>12 Signature Energy</color> and <color=#D91414>999 Kinetic Energy</color>. Each set of 3-Ping Signal Orbs consumed while charging [Leap Attack] increases the Base DMG of [Shattering Strike] by <color=#D91414>50%</color>.
- During [Shattering Strike] and the subsequent [Signature Move - Stardust Horizon], Scire is considered to be in Anti-gravity Form.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9: When the team's Electric Charge reaches its maximum, [Shattering Strike] will activate Electric Storm Flash state, deploying a Dissociation Electric Field for 14s.
 While in Electric Storm Flash state, casting [Signature Move - Stardust Horizon] will additionally cast [Signature Move - Starstream Electric Shock], dealing <color=#D91414>900%</color> Plasma Beam DMG.
- Dissociation Electric Field deals <color=#D91414>75%</color> Plasma Beam DMG once to targets caught within, and inflicts them with a <color=#D91414>Turbulence Interference</color> effect every 2s, reducing their Lightning Resistance by <color=#D91414>15%</color> for 2s.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18: During the charge-up phase of [Shattering Strike], an additional set of 3-Ping Signal Orbs can be pinged to increase the Extra DMG Bonus of the subsequent release by 200%, activating all available QTEs, and granting the team 240 Electric Charge.
New effect of [Passive - Unquenchable Willpower Lv.3] added: The Extra DMG Bonus of [Shattering Strike] increases by 50%; the additional 3-Ping consumed during the charge-up phase will cause the next [Signature Move - Starstream Electric Shock] to deal double damage.</color>

New effect of [Passive - Unquenchable Willpower Lv.3] added: The Extra DMG Bonus of [Shattering Strike] increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>; the additional 3-Ping consumed during the charge-up phase will cause the next [Signature Move - Starstream Electric Shock] to deal double damage.</color>

Name: Spinning Flare
Intro:
After Basic Attack phase 5 in the Sword Form, tap Basic Attack to follow up with a 5-phase [Dispersed Radiance]. Stigmata is Invincible when [Dispersed Radiance] is active. [Dispersed Radiance] will turn all <color=#D91414>Stigmata Will</color> into <color=#D91414>Glow Mark</color> up to 150 stacks. The <color=#D91414>Glow Mark</color> will be removed once Stigmata exits the Sword Form.
- [Dispersed Radiance] deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>941.18%</color></color> Physical DMG in total with each phase restoring extra 3 Energy.
- During Afterglow Enhancement, [Dispersed Radiance] will trigger <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color> on hit.
- Each stack of <color=#D91414>Glow Mark</color> will increase the Base DMG of the <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash(es)</color> Stigmata triggered during [Dispersed Radiance] by 1.2%.
- When having Resolution, dodge and then tap Basic Attack to directly launch Basic Attack phase 5.
- After casting [Dispersed Radiance], Stigmata's attacks will not be able to trigger the Afterglow Shadow effect.
[Effect: Ultima Slash]: Some skills can accumulate <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>. The <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> can be inherited by the next Ultima Slash character and is capped at <color=#D91414>999</color>. When there is <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>, the next skill that could <color=#D91414>trigger the Ultima Slash</color> will trigger <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color> once at the cost of <color=#D91414>100 Sharp Reserve</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>400%</color> Ultima Slash DMG. Each triggering of this will grant 1 <color=#D91414>Truewill</color>, up to <color=#D91414>90</color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9: When the Sword Form is activated with more than 50% Afterglow Points, gains a 10% CRIT DMG Bonus during Afterglow Enhancement.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18: Drag the joystick when [Sword Dance] is being cast to leave behind a phantom to launch an attack, dealing Physical DMG equal to 80% of Stigmata's ATK.
New effect added to [Passive - Severed Light Lv.2]: Gains 10 Signature Energy every time when [Dispersed Radiance] triggers an Ultima Slash.</color>

- [Dispersed Radiance] deals <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>705.88%</color></color> Physical DMG in total with each phase restoring extra 3 Energy.
- During Afterglow Enhancement, [Dispersed Radiance] will trigger <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color> on hit.
- Each stack of <color=#D91414>Glow Mark</color> will increase the Base DMG of the <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash(es)</color> Stigmata triggered during [Dispersed Radiance] by 1.2%.
- When having Resolution, dodge and then tap Basic Attack to directly launch Basic Attack phase 5.
- After casting [Dispersed Radiance], Stigmata's attacks will not be able to trigger the Afterglow Shadow effect.
[Effect: Ultima Slash]: Some skills can accumulate <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>. The <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> can be inherited by the next Ultima Slash character and is capped at <color=#D91414>999</color>. When there is <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>, the next skill that could <color=#D91414>trigger the Ultima Slash</color> will trigger <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color> once at the cost of <color=#D91414>100 Sharp Reserve</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>400%</color> Ultima Slash DMG. Each triggering of this will grant 1 <color=#D91414>Truewill</color>, up to <color=#D91414>90</color>.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9: When the Sword Form is activated with more than 50% Afterglow Points, gains a <color=#D91414>10%</color> CRIT DMG Bonus during Afterglow Enhancement.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18: Drag the joystick when [Sword Dance] is being cast to leave behind a phantom to launch an attack, dealing Physical DMG equal to 80% of Stigmata's ATK.
New effect added to [Passive - Severed Light Lv.2]: Gains 10 Signature Energy every time when [Dispersed Radiance] triggers an Ultima Slash.</color>

- After casting [Dispersed Radiance], Stigmata's attacks will not be able to trigger the Afterglow Shadow effect.
[Effect: Ultima Slash]: Some skills can accumulate <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>. The <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color> can be inherited by the next Ultima Slash character and is capped at <color=#D91414>999</color>. When there is <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Sharp Reserve</color>, the next skill that could <color=#D91414>trigger the Ultima Slash</color> will trigger <color=#D91414>Ultima Slash</color> once at the cost of <color=#D91414>100 Sharp Reserve</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>400%</color> Ultima Slash DMG. Each triggering of this will grant 1 <color=#D91414>Truewill</color>, up to <color=#D91414>90</color>.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9: When the Sword Form is activated with more than 50% Afterglow Points, gains a <color=#D91414>10%</color> CRIT DMG Bonus during Afterglow Enhancement.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18: Drag the joystick when [Sword Dance] is being cast to leave behind a phantom to launch an attack, dealing Physical DMG equal to <color=#D91414>80%</color> of Stigmata's ATK.
New effect added to [Passive - Severed Light Lv.2]: Gains <color=#D91414>10</color> Signature Energy every time when [Dispersed Radiance] triggers an Ultima Slash.</color>

Name: Cold Illumination
Intro:
Upon launching the first [Illuminated Abyss] after [Dispersed Radiance], Stigmata will follow up with [Shattered Darkness] at the cost of maximum 10 Truewill and deal <color=#D91414>225%</color>/<color=#D91414>250%</color>/<color=#D91414>275%</color>/<color=#D91414>300%</color>/<color=#D91414>325%</color>/<color=#D91414>350%</color>/<color=#D91414>375%</color>/<color=#D91414>400%</color>/<color=#D91414>425%</color>/<color=#D91414>450%</color> Ultima Slash DMG based on the Truewill spent. Stigmata spends all stacks of <color=#D91414>Glow Mark</color> to cast [Shattered Darkness]. Each stack of <color=#D91414>Glow Mark</color> will increase the Base DMG of [Shattered Darkness] by <color=#D91414>3.5%</color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9: Gains 18 stacks of Glow Mark when [Dispersed Radiance] triggers an Ultima Slash.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18: Activates all available QTEs when Luminous Realm is triggered.

Stigmata spends all stacks of <color=#D91414>Glow Mark</color> to cast [Shattered Darkness]. Each stack of <color=#D91414>Glow Mark</color> will increase the Base DMG of [Shattered Darkness] by <color=#D91414>3.5%</color>.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9: Gains <color=#D91414>18</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Glow Mark</color> when [Dispersed Radiance] triggers an Ultima Slash.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18: Activates all available QTEs when Luminous Realm is triggered.
New effect added to [Passive - Mass Decree Lv.3]: Each stack of Stigmata Will will increase [Blade Abyss - Illuminated Abyss]'s Base DMG by 7.5% instead. Each stack of Glow Mark will increase the Base DMG of the Ultima Slash(es) triggered during [Dispersed Radiance] by 2.0% and that of the [Shattered Darkness] by 4.5% instead.</color>

Each stack of <color=#D91414>Glow Mark</color> will increase the Base DMG of the Ultima Slash(es) triggered during [Dispersed Radiance] by <color=#D91414>2.0%</color> and that of the [Shattered Darkness] by <color=#D91414>4.5%</color> instead.</color>

Name: Cold Illumination
Intro:
Upon launching the first [Illuminated Abyss] after [Dispersed Radiance], Stigmata will follow up with [Shattered Darkness] at the cost of maximum 10 Truewill and deal <color=#D91414>635.29%</color>/<color=#D91414>705.88%</color>/<color=#D91414>776.47%</color>/<color=#D91414>847.06%</color>/<color=#D91414>917.65%</color>/<color=#D91414>988.24%</color>/<color=#D91414>1058.82%</color>/<color=#D91414>1129.41%</color>/<color=#D91414>1200%</color>/<color=#D91414>1270.59%</color> Ultima Slash DMG based on the Truewill spent. Stigmata spends all stacks of <color=#D91414>Glow Mark</color> to cast [Shattered Darkness]. Each stack of <color=#D91414>Glow Mark</color> will increase the Base DMG of [Shattered Darkness] by <color=#D91414>3.5%</color>.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9: Gains <color=#D91414>18</color> stacks of <color=#D91414>Glow Mark</color> when [Dispersed Radiance] triggers an Ultima Slash.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18: Activates all available QTEs when Luminous Realm is triggered.

Name: Shower of Dawnlight
Intro:
Base DMG of Signal Orbs increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>10%</color></color>. When casting Ping Skills, gains <color=#D91414>17/34/50 Sharp Reserve</color> based on the number of orbs pinged.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9: Glowing Lanternlight deals 15% more Extra DMG and grants 100 Sharp Reserve on hit.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18: Casting [Glowing Lanternlight] or performing a 3-Ping during the Luminous Realm will make the next [Bright Candle] deal 25% more Extra DMG. This effect can stack up to 3 times.
New effect added to [Passive - Carved Darkness Lv.2]: [Signature - Bright Candle]'s DMG Record Multiplier will be 110% instead. [Shattered Darkness]'s Extra DMG Bonus increases by 30%.</color>

New effect added to [Passive - Carved Darkness Lv.2]: [Signature - Bright Candle]'s DMG Record Multiplier will be <color=#D91414>110%</color> instead. [Shattered Darkness]'s Extra DMG Bonus increases by <color=#D91414>30%</color>.</color>

Name: Flashstorm
Intro:
During Leaping Thrust, <color=#0d70bc>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to convert Red and Yellow Orbs into Shadow Strike Orbs. Pinging any Shadow Strike Orb unleashes Shadow Strike.
- Crimson Weave throws the odachi, dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>30%</color></color> Darkflow DMG. For each Shadow Strike Orb pinged, unleashes one stage of Shadow Strike (up to 6 stages, automatically pinged by continuous taps or pressing and holding Basic Attack), dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>225%</color></color> Darkflow DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>1 Signature Energy</color> and <color=#D91414>15</color> Aphotic Points. Then, unleashes Shadow: Thunderous Bash, dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>470%</color></color> Darkflow DMG.
- Upon fully unleashing 6 stages of Shadow Strike, the next use of [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] will instead deal <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>1300%</color></color> Darkflow DMG.
- <color=#0d70bc>While Motorbolt is on standby, ping any Shadow Strike Orb during Leaping Thrust to unleash Shadow Strike.</color>

<color=#645F5D>At Lv.9: Each stack of Darkflow increases Shadow Strike's Base DMG by 10%.
[Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] will clear all Darkflow stacks and deal an extra 400% Darkflow DMG per stack cleared.</color>

<color=#645F5D>At Lv.18: Each time Thunderous Bash or Shadow: Thunderous Bash consumes 1 Aphotic Point, increases the Base DMG of the next [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] by 0.15% (cannot stack).
New effect of [Passive - Drifting Vain Lv.2] added: Each stack of Darkflow increases Shadow Strike's Base DMG by a further 5%.</color>

For each Shadow Strike Orb pinged, unleashes one stage of Shadow Strike (up to 6 stages, automatically pinged by continuous taps or pressing and holding Basic Attack), dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>304.41%</color></color> Darkflow DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>1 Signature Energy</color> and <color=#D91414>15</color> Aphotic Points. Then, unleashes Shadow: Thunderous Bash, dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>635.88%</color></color> Darkflow DMG.
- Upon fully unleashing 6 stages of Shadow Strike, the next use of [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] will instead deal <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>1758.82%</color></color> Darkflow DMG.
- <color=#0d70bc>While Motorbolt is on standby, ping any Shadow Strike Orb during Leaping Thrust to unleash Shadow Strike.</color>

<color=#645F5D>At Lv.9: Each stack of Darkflow increases Shadow Strike's Base DMG by 10%.
[Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] will clear all Darkflow stacks and deal an extra 400% Darkflow DMG per stack cleared.</color>

<color=#645F5D>At Lv.18: Each time Thunderous Bash or Shadow: Thunderous Bash consumes 1 Aphotic Point, increases the Base DMG of the next [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] by 0.15% (cannot stack).
New effect of [Passive - Drifting Vain Lv.2] added: Each stack of Darkflow increases Shadow Strike's Base DMG by a further 5%.</color>

Name: Flashstorm
Intro:
During Leaping Thrust, <color=#0d70bc>press and hold Basic Attack</color> to convert Red and Yellow Orbs into Shadow Strike Orbs. Pinging any Shadow Strike Orb unleashes Shadow Strike.
- Crimson Weave throws the odachi, dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>67.06%</color></color> Darkflow DMG. For each Shadow Strike Orb pinged, unleashes one stage of Shadow Strike (up to 6 stages, automatically pinged by continuous taps or pressing and holding Basic Attack), dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>502.94%</color></color> Darkflow DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>1 Signature Energy</color> and <color=#D91414>15</color> Aphotic Points. Then, unleashes Shadow: Thunderous Bash, dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>1050.59%</color></color> Darkflow DMG.
- Upon fully unleashing 6 stages of Shadow Strike, the next use of [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] will instead deal <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>2905.88%</color></color> Darkflow DMG.
- <color=#0d70bc>While Motorbolt is on standby, ping any Shadow Strike Orb during Leaping Thrust to unleash Shadow Strike.</color>

<color=#0F70BC>At Lv.9: Each stack of Darkflow increases Shadow Strike's Base DMG by <color=#D91414>10%</color>.
[Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] will clear all Darkflow stacks and deal an extra <color=#D91414>400%</color> Darkflow DMG per stack cleared.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>At Lv.18: Each time Thunderous Bash or Shadow: Thunderous Bash consumes 1 Aphotic Point, increases the Base DMG of the next [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] by <color=#D91414>0.15%</color> (cannot stack).
New effect of [Passive - Drifting Vain Lv.2] added: Each stack of Darkflow increases Shadow Strike's Base DMG by a further <color=#D91414>5%</color>.</color>

Name: Unmanifest Will
Intro:
Increases [Core Passive - Resolute Blow] Base DMG by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>30%</color></color>, and can fend off 2 extra attacks while parrying.

<color=#645F5D>At Lv.9: Within 3s after pinging 3 Red or Yellow Orbs, Blade Aura drop rate increases when casting [Core Passive - Sundered Delusion], and [Core Passive - Resolute Blow] is automatically and quickly cast when Blade Aura reaches its maximum.</color>

<color=#645F5D>At Lv 18: Gains 9 Signature Energy upon entering the battle.
New effect of [Passive - Facets of Delusions Lv.2] added: Casting [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] increases Base DMG of [QTE - Flashes of Steel] by 1000% throughout the battle. [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] deals 200% extra Darkflow DMG per stack cleared.</color>

Name: Unmanifest Will
Intro:
Increases [Core Passive - Resolute Blow] Base DMG by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>30%</color></color>, and can fend off 2 extra attacks while parrying.

<color=#645F5D>At Lv.9: Within 3s after pinging 3 Red or Yellow Orbs, Blade Aura drop rate increases when casting [Core Passive - Sundered Delusion], and [Core Passive - Resolute Blow] is automatically and quickly cast when Blade Aura reaches its maximum.</color>

<color=#645F5D>At Lv 18: Gains 9 Signature Energy upon entering the battle.
New effect of [Passive - Facets of Delusions Lv.2] added: Casting [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] increases Base DMG of [QTE - Flashes of Steel] by 1000% throughout the battle. [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] deals 200% extra Darkflow DMG per stack cleared.</color>

New effect of [Passive - Facets of Delusions Lv.2] added: Casting [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] increases Base DMG of [QTE - Flashes of Steel] by <color=#D91414>1000%</color> throughout the battle. [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] deals <color=#D91414>200%</color> extra Darkflow DMG per stack cleared.</color>

Name: Thunderforge
Intro:
[Core Passive - Path of Anatta] New Effect: [Darkflow]:
For every <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve, gain 1 Darkflow stack, up to a maximum of 15. The character gains a Darkflow Aura based on the current number of stacks, dealing a small amount of Darkflow DMG over time to enemies and reducing their HP recovery. When the number of stacks reaches a threshold, the aura upgrades, increasing its range and dealing a large amount of Darkflow DMG to enemies within the area.
- At <color=#D91414>1/3/6/10/15</color> stacks: Deals <color=#D91414>100%/200%/400%/800%/1600%</color> Darkflow DMG, then deals <color=#D91414>20%/40%/60%/80%/100%</color> Darkflow DMG per second, reducing enemy HP recovery by <color=#D91414>10%/20%/30%/50%/100%</color>;
Pinging a Blue Orb grants <color=#D91414>50/100/200</color> Darkflow Reserve. Casting [Core Passive - Resolute Blow] while wielding a kodachi grants <color=#D91414>50/100/200</color> Darkflow Reserve. Continuously casting the Swordwave of [Basic Attack - Blading Radiance] grants <color=#D91414>60</color> Darkflow Reserve every 0.5s, and an extra <color=#D91414>100</color> Darkflow Reserve while the Swordwave is enhanced.

<color=#645F5D>At Lv.9: Base DMG from pinging Signal Orbs increases by <color=#D91414>25%</color>.
When pinging for the first time upon entering Matrix, only 1 Signal Orb will be consumed.</color>

<color=#645F5D>At Lv.18: While wielding a kodachi, all Signal Orbs are converted to Blue Orbs.
New effect added to [Passive - Glimpse Into All Lv.3]: While wielding an odachi, gain a 15% Extra DMG Bonus.</color>
