<color=#0F70BC>At Lv.9: Base DMG from pinging Signal Orbs increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>41.18%</color></color>.
When pinging for the first time upon entering Matrix, only 1 Signal Orb will be consumed.</color>

<color=#645F5D>At Lv.18: While wielding a kodachi, all Signal Orbs are converted to Blue Orbs.
New effect added to [Passive - Glimpse Into All Lv.3]: While wielding an odachi, gain a 15% Extra DMG Bonus.</color>

Name: Thunderforge
Intro:
[Core Passive - Path of Anatta] New Effect: [Darkflow]:
For every <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve, gain 1 Darkflow stack, up to a maximum of 15. The character gains a Darkflow Aura based on the current number of stacks, dealing a small amount of Darkflow DMG over time to enemies and reducing their HP recovery. When the number of stacks reaches a threshold, the aura upgrades, increasing its range and dealing a large amount of Darkflow DMG to enemies within the area.
- At <color=#D91414>1/3/6/10/15</color> stacks: Deals <color=#D91414>100%/200%/400%/800%/1600%</color> Darkflow DMG, then deals <color=#D91414>20%/40%/60%/80%/100%</color> Darkflow DMG per second, reducing enemy HP recovery by <color=#D91414>10%/20%/30%/50%/100%</color>;
Pinging a Blue Orb grants <color=#D91414>50/100/200</color> Darkflow Reserve. Casting [Core Passive - Resolute Blow] while wielding a kodachi grants <color=#D91414>50/100/200</color> Darkflow Reserve. Continuously casting the Swordwave of [Basic Attack - Blading Radiance] grants <color=#D91414>60</color> Darkflow Reserve every 0.5s, and an extra <color=#D91414>100</color> Darkflow Reserve while the Swordwave is enhanced.

<color=#0F70BC>At Lv.9: Base DMG from pinging Signal Orbs increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>42.65%</color></color>.

- At <color=#D91414>1/3/6/10/15</color> stacks: Deals <color=#D91414>100%/200%/400%/800%/1600%</color> Darkflow DMG, then deals <color=#D91414>20%/40%/60%/80%/100%</color> Darkflow DMG per second, reducing enemy HP recovery by <color=#D91414>10%/20%/30%/50%/100%</color>;
Pinging a Blue Orb grants <color=#D91414>50/100/200</color> Darkflow Reserve. Casting [Core Passive - Resolute Blow] while wielding a kodachi grants <color=#D91414>50/100/200</color> Darkflow Reserve. Continuously casting the Swordwave of [Basic Attack - Blading Radiance] grants <color=#D91414>60</color> Darkflow Reserve every 0.5s, and an extra <color=#D91414>100</color> Darkflow Reserve while the Swordwave is enhanced.

<color=#0F70BC>At Lv.9: Base DMG from pinging Signal Orbs increases by <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>63.24%</color></color>.
When pinging for the first time upon entering Matrix, only 1 Signal Orb will be consumed.</color>

<color=#0F70BC>At Lv.18: While wielding a kodachi, all Signal Orbs are converted to Blue Orbs.
New effect added to [Passive - Glimpse Into All Lv.3]: While wielding an odachi, gain a <color=#D91414>15%</color> Extra DMG Bonus.</color>

Name: Flashstorm
Intro:
During Leaping Thrust, <color=#0d70bc>Red and Yellow Orbs are converted into Shadow Strike Orbs. Pinging any Shadow Strike Orb unleashes Shadow Strike.</color>
- Crimson Weave throws the odachi, dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>30%</color></color> Darkflow DMG. For each Shadow Strike Orb pinged, unleashes one stage of Shadow Strike (up to 6 stages), dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>225%</color></color> Darkflow DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>1 Signature Energy</color> and <color=#D91414>15</color> Aphotic Points. Then, unleashes Shadow: Thunderous Bash, dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>470%</color></color> Darkflow DMG.
- Upon fully unleashing 6 stages of Shadow Strike, the next use of [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] will instead deal <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>1300%</color></color> Darkflow DMG.

<color=#645F5D>At Lv.9: Each stack of Darkflow increases Shadow Strike's Base DMG by 10%.
[Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] will clear all Darkflow stacks and deal an extra 400% Darkflow DMG per stack cleared.</color>

<color=#645F5D>At Lv.18: Each time Thunderous Bash or Shadow: Thunderous Bash consumes 1 Aphotic Point, increases the Base DMG of the next [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] by 0.15% (cannot stack).
New effect of [Passive - Drifting Vain Lv.2] added: Each stack of Darkflow increases Shadow Strike's Base DMG by a further 5%.</color>

- Crimson Weave throws the odachi, dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>40.59%</color></color> Darkflow DMG. For each Shadow Strike Orb pinged, unleashes one stage of Shadow Strike (up to 6 stages), dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>304.41%</color></color> Darkflow DMG and restoring <color=#D91414>1 Signature Energy</color> and <color=#D91414>15</color> Aphotic Points. Then, unleashes Shadow: Thunderous Bash, dealing <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>635.88%</color></color> Darkflow DMG.
- Upon fully unleashing 6 stages of Shadow Strike, the next use of [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] will instead deal <color=#D91414><color=#D91414>1758.82%</color></color> Darkflow DMG.

<color=#645F5D>At Lv.9: Each stack of Darkflow increases Shadow Strike's Base DMG by 10%.
[Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] will clear all Darkflow stacks and deal an extra 400% Darkflow DMG per stack cleared.</color>

<color=#645F5D>At Lv.18: Each time Thunderous Bash or Shadow: Thunderous Bash consumes 1 Aphotic Point, increases the Base DMG of the next [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] by 0.15% (cannot stack).
New effect of [Passive - Drifting Vain Lv.2] added: Each stack of Darkflow increases Shadow Strike's Base DMG by a further 5%.</color>

<color=#0F70BC>At Lv.18: Each time Thunderous Bash or Shadow: Thunderous Bash consumes 1 Aphotic Point, increases the Base DMG of the next [Signature - Weave: Karmic Inferno] by <color=#D91414>0.15%</color> (cannot stack).
New effect of [Passive - Drifting Vain Lv.2] added: Each stack of Darkflow increases Shadow Strike's Base DMG by a further <color=#D91414>5%</color>.</color>

Name: Infinite Chord
Intro:
[Core Passive - Echoing Twins] New Effect: Glaciation.
Some of the skills can fill the <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>. When the gauge is full, consume it to cast <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>. Casting certain skills will consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG to nearby enemies. While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals additional Glaciation DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, they will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal Glaciation DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. The <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>, <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> can transfer to the next character with Effect: Glaciation.
- At <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>, casts <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG and generate <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color>. Max <color=#D91414>10 Layers</color>.
- When having more than <color=#D91414>0</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, certain skills can consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>180%</color> Glaciation DMG. When forming <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, every <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color> consumed will extend their duration by <color=#D91414>1</color>s.
- While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area and gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. This can only trigger <color=#D91414>once</color> every <color=#D91414>0.25</color>s.
- When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, it will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area. For every <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> owned, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> increases by <color=#D91414>9%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>10000</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>.
When Judgment Zone is not expanded, press and hold Dodge to make Echo shoot an Ice Arrow, dealing <color=#D91414>400%</color> Glaciation DMG, and expand an <color=#D91414>8</color>-second Congelation Zone. In the Congelation Zone, at Max Splendor Points, press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo spend all Splendor Points and cast Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike (During this process, Echo will become Invincible and this cannot be interrupted by [Signature - Celestial Edge]), imprisoning the nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>1200%</color> Glaciation DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>50 Signature Energy</color> to herself, and activating all available QTEs.
Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike will consume all Cipher Orbs, a maximum equal number of Signal Orbs, and the Soul Shatter Mark (if available) to enhance Effect: Glaciation accordingly.
- Each Cipher Orb will increase the Base DMG of Arctic Ice and Ice Spikes by <color=#D91414>4%</color>. Each Signal Orb will increase the Base DMG of Ice Accumulation by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>24</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. The Soul Shatter Mark will enhance the effect caused by Congelation. Every 100 Congelation will increase the Base DMG of the next Ice Burst by <color=#D91414>200%</color> (cannot be stacked).
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — When there are Ice Spikes, Echo will reset their duration to 10s when casting [Signature - Celestial Edge]. [QTE - Advent of Justice] will prolong their duration by 4s and deal 600% Glaciation DMG instead. Cecily will deal extra 200% Glaciation DMG and accumulate extra 100 Congelation for the team when launching a Cipher Attack.
- Ice Spikes last no longer than 10s.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Base DMG of Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike, Imprisoning Co-Strike, and Soulbreaking Co-Strike increases by 50%.
New effect of [Passive - Decisive Omen Lv.2] added: The final effect of Ultralimit Torque inflicted by [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] increases by 5%. If the Congelation Mark is activated, then applies Imprisoned Star that increases Glaciation DMG by 5% instead. When there are Ice Spikes, Cecily's Cipher Attacks will accumulate extra 200 Congelation for the team instead.</color>

While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals additional Glaciation DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, they will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal Glaciation DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. The <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>, <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> can transfer to the next character with Effect: Glaciation.
- At <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>, casts <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG and generate <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color>. Max <color=#D91414>10 Layers</color>.
- When having more than <color=#D91414>0</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, certain skills can consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>180%</color> Glaciation DMG. When forming <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, every <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color> consumed will extend their duration by <color=#D91414>1</color>s.
- While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area and gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. This can only trigger <color=#D91414>once</color> every <color=#D91414>0.25</color>s.
- When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, it will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area. For every <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> owned, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> increases by <color=#D91414>9%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>10000</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>.
When Judgment Zone is not expanded, press and hold Dodge to make Echo shoot an Ice Arrow, dealing <color=#D91414>400%</color> Glaciation DMG, and expand an <color=#D91414>8</color>-second Congelation Zone. In the Congelation Zone, at Max Splendor Points, press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo spend all Splendor Points and cast Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike (During this process, Echo will become Invincible and this cannot be interrupted by [Signature - Celestial Edge]), imprisoning the nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>1200%</color> Glaciation DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>50 Signature Energy</color> to herself, and activating all available QTEs.
Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike will consume all Cipher Orbs, a maximum equal number of Signal Orbs, and the Soul Shatter Mark (if available) to enhance Effect: Glaciation accordingly.
- Each Cipher Orb will increase the Base DMG of Arctic Ice and Ice Spikes by <color=#D91414>4%</color>. Each Signal Orb will increase the Base DMG of Ice Accumulation by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>24</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. The Soul Shatter Mark will enhance the effect caused by Congelation. Every 100 Congelation will increase the Base DMG of the next Ice Burst by <color=#D91414>200%</color> (cannot be stacked).
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — When there are Ice Spikes, Echo will reset their duration to 10s when casting [Signature - Celestial Edge]. [QTE - Advent of Justice] will prolong their duration by 4s and deal 600% Glaciation DMG instead. Cecily will deal extra 200% Glaciation DMG and accumulate extra 100 Congelation for the team when launching a Cipher Attack.
- Ice Spikes last no longer than 10s.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Base DMG of Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike, Imprisoning Co-Strike, and Soulbreaking Co-Strike increases by 50%.
New effect of [Passive - Decisive Omen Lv.2] added: The final effect of Ultralimit Torque inflicted by [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] increases by 5%. If the Congelation Mark is activated, then applies Imprisoned Star that increases Glaciation DMG by 5% instead. When there are Ice Spikes, Cecily's Cipher Attacks will accumulate extra 200 Congelation for the team instead.</color>

When forming <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, every <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color> consumed will extend their duration by <color=#D91414>1</color>s.
- While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area and gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. This can only trigger <color=#D91414>once</color> every <color=#D91414>0.25</color>s.
- When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, it will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area. For every <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> owned, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> increases by <color=#D91414>9%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>10000</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>.
When Judgment Zone is not expanded, press and hold Dodge to make Echo shoot an Ice Arrow, dealing <color=#D91414>517.65%</color> Glaciation DMG, and expand an <color=#D91414>8</color>-second Congelation Zone. In the Congelation Zone, at Max Splendor Points, press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo spend all Splendor Points and cast Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike (During this process, Echo will become Invincible and this cannot be interrupted by [Signature - Celestial Edge]), imprisoning the nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>1552.94%</color> Glaciation DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>50 Signature Energy</color> to herself, and activating all available QTEs.
Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike will consume all Cipher Orbs, a maximum equal number of Signal Orbs, and the Soul Shatter Mark (if available) to enhance Effect: Glaciation accordingly.
- Each Cipher Orb will increase the Base DMG of Arctic Ice and Ice Spikes by <color=#D91414>4%</color>. Each Signal Orb will increase the Base DMG of Ice Accumulation by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>24</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. The Soul Shatter Mark will enhance the effect caused by Congelation. Every 100 Congelation will increase the Base DMG of the next Ice Burst by <color=#D91414>200%</color> (cannot be stacked).
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — When there are Ice Spikes, Echo will reset their duration to 10s when casting [Signature - Celestial Edge]. [QTE - Advent of Justice] will prolong their duration by 4s and deal 600% Glaciation DMG instead. Cecily will deal extra 200% Glaciation DMG and accumulate extra 100 Congelation for the team when launching a Cipher Attack.
- Ice Spikes last no longer than 10s.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Base DMG of Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike, Imprisoning Co-Strike, and Soulbreaking Co-Strike increases by 50%.
New effect of [Passive - Decisive Omen Lv.2] added: The final effect of Ultralimit Torque inflicted by [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] increases by 5%. If the Congelation Mark is activated, then applies Imprisoned Star that increases Glaciation DMG by 5% instead. When there are Ice Spikes, Cecily's Cipher Attacks will accumulate extra 200 Congelation for the team instead.</color>

Name: Infinite Chord
Intro:
[Core Passive - Echoing Twins] New Effect: Glaciation.
Some of the skills can fill the <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>. When the gauge is full, consume it to cast <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>. Casting certain skills will consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG to nearby enemies. While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals additional Glaciation DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, they will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal Glaciation DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. The <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>, <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> can transfer to the next character with Effect: Glaciation.
- At <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>, casts <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG and generate <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color>. Max <color=#D91414>10 Layers</color>.
- When having more than <color=#D91414>0</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, certain skills can consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>180%</color> Glaciation DMG. When forming <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, every <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color> consumed will extend their duration by <color=#D91414>1</color>s.
- While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area and gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. This can only trigger <color=#D91414>once</color> every <color=#D91414>0.25</color>s.
- When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, it will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area. For every <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> owned, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> increases by <color=#D91414>9%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>10000</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>.
When Judgment Zone is not expanded, press and hold Dodge to make Echo shoot an Ice Arrow, dealing <color=#D91414>541.18%</color> Glaciation DMG, and expand an <color=#D91414>8</color>-second Congelation Zone. In the Congelation Zone, at Max Splendor Points, press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo spend all Splendor Points and cast Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike (During this process, Echo will become Invincible and this cannot be interrupted by [Signature - Celestial Edge]), imprisoning the nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>1623.53%</color> Glaciation DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>50 Signature Energy</color> to herself, and activating all available QTEs.
Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike will consume all Cipher Orbs, a maximum equal number of Signal Orbs, and the Soul Shatter Mark (if available) to enhance Effect: Glaciation accordingly.
- Each Cipher Orb will increase the Base DMG of Arctic Ice and Ice Spikes by <color=#D91414>4%</color>. Each Signal Orb will increase the Base DMG of Ice Accumulation by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>24</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. The Soul Shatter Mark will enhance the effect caused by Congelation. Every 100 Congelation will increase the Base DMG of the next Ice Burst by <color=#D91414>200%</color> (cannot be stacked).
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — When there are Ice Spikes, Echo will reset their duration to 10s when casting [Signature - Celestial Edge]. [QTE - Advent of Justice] will prolong their duration by 4s and deal 600% Glaciation DMG instead. Cecily will deal extra 200% Glaciation DMG and accumulate extra 100 Congelation for the team when launching a Cipher Attack.
- Ice Spikes last no longer than 10s.</color>

- While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area and gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. This can only trigger <color=#D91414>once</color> every <color=#D91414>0.25</color>s.
- When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, it will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area. For every <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> owned, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> increases by <color=#D91414>9%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>10000</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>.
When Judgment Zone is not expanded, press and hold Dodge to make Echo shoot an Ice Arrow, dealing <color=#D91414>635.29%</color> Glaciation DMG, and expand an <color=#D91414>8</color>-second Congelation Zone. In the Congelation Zone, at Max Splendor Points, press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo spend all Splendor Points and cast Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike (During this process, Echo will become Invincible and this cannot be interrupted by [Signature - Celestial Edge]), imprisoning the nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>1905.88%</color> Glaciation DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>50 Signature Energy</color> to herself, and activating all available QTEs.
Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike will consume all Cipher Orbs, a maximum equal number of Signal Orbs, and the Soul Shatter Mark (if available) to enhance Effect: Glaciation accordingly.
- Each Cipher Orb will increase the Base DMG of Arctic Ice and Ice Spikes by <color=#D91414>4%</color>. Each Signal Orb will increase the Base DMG of Ice Accumulation by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>24</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. The Soul Shatter Mark will enhance the effect caused by Congelation. Every 100 Congelation will increase the Base DMG of the next Ice Burst by <color=#D91414>200%</color> (cannot be stacked).
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — When there are Ice Spikes, Echo will reset their duration to <color=#D91414>10</color>s when casting [Signature - Celestial Edge]. [QTE - Advent of Justice] will prolong their duration by <color=#D91414>4</color>s and deal <color=#D91414>600%</color> Glaciation DMG instead. Cecily will deal extra <color=#D91414>200%</color> Glaciation DMG and accumulate extra <color=#D91414>100</color> Congelation for the team when launching a Cipher Attack.
- Ice Spikes last no longer than <color=#D91414>10</color>s.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Base DMG of Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike, Imprisoning Co-Strike, and Soulbreaking Co-Strike increases by 50%.
New effect of [Passive - Decisive Omen Lv.2] added: The final effect of Ultralimit Torque inflicted by [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] increases by 5%. If the Congelation Mark is activated, then applies Imprisoned Star that increases Glaciation DMG by 5% instead. When there are Ice Spikes, Cecily's Cipher Attacks will accumulate extra 200 Congelation for the team instead.</color>

Name: Infinite Chord
Intro:
[Core Passive - Echoing Twins] New Effect: Glaciation.
Some of the skills can fill the <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>. When the gauge is full, consume it to cast <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>. Casting certain skills will consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG to nearby enemies. While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals additional Glaciation DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, they will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal Glaciation DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. The <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>, <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> can transfer to the next character with Effect: Glaciation.
- At <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>, casts <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG and generate <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color>. Max <color=#D91414>10 Layers</color>.
- When having more than <color=#D91414>0</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, certain skills can consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>180%</color> Glaciation DMG. When forming <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, every <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color> consumed will extend their duration by <color=#D91414>1</color>s.
- While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area and gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. This can only trigger <color=#D91414>once</color> every <color=#D91414>0.25</color>s.
- When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, it will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area. For every <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> owned, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> increases by <color=#D91414>9%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>10000</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>.
When Judgment Zone is not expanded, press and hold Dodge to make Echo shoot an Ice Arrow, dealing <color=#D91414>658.82%</color> Glaciation DMG, and expand an <color=#D91414>8</color>-second Congelation Zone. In the Congelation Zone, at Max Splendor Points, press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo spend all Splendor Points and cast Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike (During this process, Echo will become Invincible and this cannot be interrupted by [Signature - Celestial Edge]), imprisoning the nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>1976.47%</color> Glaciation DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>50 Signature Energy</color> to herself, and activating all available QTEs.
Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike will consume all Cipher Orbs, a maximum equal number of Signal Orbs, and the Soul Shatter Mark (if available) to enhance Effect: Glaciation accordingly.
- Each Cipher Orb will increase the Base DMG of Arctic Ice and Ice Spikes by <color=#D91414>4%</color>. Each Signal Orb will increase the Base DMG of Ice Accumulation by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>24</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. The Soul Shatter Mark will enhance the effect caused by Congelation. Every 100 Congelation will increase the Base DMG of the next Ice Burst by <color=#D91414>200%</color> (cannot be stacked).
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — When there are Ice Spikes, Echo will reset their duration to <color=#D91414>10</color>s when casting [Signature - Celestial Edge]. [QTE - Advent of Justice] will prolong their duration by <color=#D91414>4</color>s and deal <color=#D91414>600%</color> Glaciation DMG instead. - When having more than <color=#D91414>0</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, certain skills can consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>180%</color> Glaciation DMG. When forming <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, every <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color> consumed will extend their duration by <color=#D91414>1</color>s.
- While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area and gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. This can only trigger <color=#D91414>once</color> every <color=#D91414>0.25</color>s.
- When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, it will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area. For every <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> owned, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> increases by <color=#D91414>9%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>10000</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>.
When Judgment Zone is not expanded, press and hold Dodge to make Echo shoot an Ice Arrow, dealing <color=#D91414>752.94%</color> Glaciation DMG, and expand an <color=#D91414>8</color>-second Congelation Zone. In the Congelation Zone, at Max Splendor Points, press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo spend all Splendor Points and cast Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike (During this process, Echo will become Invincible and this cannot be interrupted by [Signature - Celestial Edge]), imprisoning the nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>2258.82%</color> Glaciation DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>50 Signature Energy</color> to herself, and activating all available QTEs.
Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike will consume all Cipher Orbs, a maximum equal number of Signal Orbs, and the Soul Shatter Mark (if available) to enhance Effect: Glaciation accordingly.
- Each Cipher Orb will increase the Base DMG of Arctic Ice and Ice Spikes by <color=#D91414>4%</color>. Each Signal Orb will increase the Base DMG of Ice Accumulation by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>24</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. The Soul Shatter Mark will enhance the effect caused by Congelation. Every 100 Congelation will increase the Base DMG of the next Ice Burst by <color=#D91414>200%</color> (cannot be stacked).
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — When there are Ice Spikes, Echo will reset their duration to <color=#D91414>10</color>s when casting [Signature - Celestial Edge]. [QTE - Advent of Justice] will prolong their duration by <color=#D91414>4</color>s and deal <color=#D91414>600%</color> Glaciation DMG instead. Cecily will deal extra <color=#D91414>200%</color> Glaciation DMG and accumulate extra <color=#D91414>100</color> Congelation for the team when launching a Cipher Attack.
- Ice Spikes last no longer than <color=#D91414>10</color>s.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Base DMG of Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike, Imprisoning Co-Strike, and Soulbreaking Co-Strike increases by 50%.
New effect of [Passive - Decisive Omen Lv.2] added: The final effect of Ultralimit Torque inflicted by [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] increases by 5%. If the Congelation Mark is activated, then applies Imprisoned Star that increases Glaciation DMG by 5% instead. When there are Ice Spikes, Cecily's Cipher Attacks will accumulate extra 200 Congelation for the team instead.</color>

Name: Infinite Chord
Intro:
[Core Passive - Echoing Twins] New Effect: Glaciation.
Some of the skills can fill the <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>. When the gauge is full, consume it to cast <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>. Casting certain skills will consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG to nearby enemies. While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals additional Glaciation DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, they will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal Glaciation DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. The <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>, <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> can transfer to the next character with Effect: Glaciation.
- At <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>, casts <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG and generate <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color>. Max <color=#D91414>10 Layers</color>.
- When having more than <color=#D91414>0</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, certain skills can consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>180%</color> Glaciation DMG. When forming <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, every <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color> consumed will extend their duration by <color=#D91414>1</color>s.
- While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area and gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. This can only trigger <color=#D91414>once</color> every <color=#D91414>0.25</color>s.
- When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, it will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area. For every <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> owned, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> increases by <color=#D91414>9%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>10000</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>.
When Judgment Zone is not expanded, press and hold Dodge to make Echo shoot an Ice Arrow, dealing <color=#D91414>776.47%</color> Glaciation DMG, and expand an <color=#D91414>8</color>-second Congelation Zone. In the Congelation Zone, at Max Splendor Points, press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo spend all Splendor Points and cast Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike (During this process, Echo will become Invincible and this cannot be interrupted by [Signature - Celestial Edge]), imprisoning the nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>2329.41%</color> Glaciation DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>50 Signature Energy</color> to herself, and activating all available QTEs.
Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike will consume all Cipher Orbs, a maximum equal number of Signal Orbs, and the Soul Shatter Mark (if available) to enhance Effect: Glaciation accordingly.
- Each Cipher Orb will increase the Base DMG of Arctic Ice and Ice Spikes by <color=#D91414>4%</color>. Each Signal Orb will increase the Base DMG of Ice Accumulation by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>24</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. The Soul Shatter Mark will enhance the effect caused by Congelation. Every 100 Congelation will increase the Base DMG of the next Ice Burst by <color=#D91414>200%</color> (cannot be stacked).
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — When there are Ice Spikes, Echo will reset their duration to <color=#D91414>10</color>s when casting [Signature - Celestial Edge]. [QTE - Advent of Justice] will prolong their duration by <color=#D91414>4</color>s and deal <color=#D91414>600%</color> Glaciation DMG instead. Cecily will deal extra <color=#D91414>200%</color> Glaciation DMG and accumulate extra <color=#D91414>100</color> Congelation for the team when launching a Cipher Attack.
- Ice Spikes last no longer than <color=#D91414>10</color>s.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Base DMG of Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike, Imprisoning Co-Strike, and Soulbreaking Co-Strike increases by 50%.
New effect of [Passive - Decisive Omen Lv.2] added: The final effect of Ultralimit Torque inflicted by [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] increases by 5%. If the Congelation Mark is activated, then applies Imprisoned Star that increases Glaciation DMG by 5% instead. When there are Ice Spikes, Cecily's Cipher Attacks will accumulate extra 200 Congelation for the team instead.</color>

Casting certain skills will consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG to nearby enemies. While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals additional Glaciation DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, they will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal Glaciation DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. The <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>, <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> can transfer to the next character with Effect: Glaciation.
- At <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>, casts <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG and generate <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color>. Max <color=#D91414>10 Layers</color>.
- When having more than <color=#D91414>0</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, certain skills can consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>180%</color> Glaciation DMG. When forming <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, every <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color> consumed will extend their duration by <color=#D91414>1</color>s.
- While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area and gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. This can only trigger <color=#D91414>once</color> every <color=#D91414>0.25</color>s.
- When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, it will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area. For every <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> owned, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> increases by <color=#D91414>9%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>10000</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>.
When Judgment Zone is not expanded, press and hold Dodge to make Echo shoot an Ice Arrow, dealing <color=#D91414>870.59%</color> Glaciation DMG, and expand an <color=#D91414>8</color>-second Congelation Zone. In the Congelation Zone, at Max Splendor Points, press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo spend all Splendor Points and cast Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike (During this process, Echo will become Invincible and this cannot be interrupted by [Signature - Celestial Edge]), imprisoning the nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>2611.76%</color> Glaciation DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>50 Signature Energy</color> to herself, and activating all available QTEs.
Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike will consume all Cipher Orbs, a maximum equal number of Signal Orbs, and the Soul Shatter Mark (if available) to enhance Effect: Glaciation accordingly.
- Each Cipher Orb will increase the Base DMG of Arctic Ice and Ice Spikes by <color=#D91414>4%</color>. Each Signal Orb will increase the Base DMG of Ice Accumulation by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>24</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. The Soul Shatter Mark will enhance the effect caused by Congelation. Every 100 Congelation will increase the Base DMG of the next Ice Burst by <color=#D91414>200%</color> (cannot be stacked).
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — When there are Ice Spikes, Echo will reset their duration to <color=#D91414>10</color>s when casting [Signature - Celestial Edge]. [QTE - Advent of Justice] will prolong their duration by <color=#D91414>4</color>s and deal <color=#D91414>600%</color> Glaciation DMG instead. Cecily will deal extra <color=#D91414>200%</color> Glaciation DMG and accumulate extra <color=#D91414>100</color> Congelation for the team when launching a Cipher Attack.
- Ice Spikes last no longer than <color=#D91414>10</color>s.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — Base DMG of Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike, Imprisoning Co-Strike, and Soulbreaking Co-Strike increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>.
New effect of [Passive - Decisive Omen Lv.2] added: The final effect of <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> inflicted by [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] increases by <color=#D91414>5%</color>. If the Congelation Mark is activated, If the Congelation Mark is activated, then applies <color=#D91414>Imprisoned Star</color> that increases Glaciation DMG by <color=#D91414>5%</color> instead. When there are Ice Spikes, Cecily's Cipher Attacks will accumulate extra <color=#D91414>200</color> Congelation for the team instead.</color>

Cecily will deal extra <color=#D91414>200%</color> Glaciation DMG and accumulate extra <color=#D91414>100</color> Congelation for the team when launching a Cipher Attack.
- Ice Spikes last no longer than <color=#D91414>10</color>s.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — Base DMG of Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike, Imprisoning Co-Strike, and Soulbreaking Co-Strike increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>.
New effect of [Passive - Decisive Omen Lv.2] added: The final effect of <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> inflicted by [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] increases by <color=#D91414>5%</color>. If the Congelation Mark is activated, If the Congelation Mark is activated, then applies <color=#D91414>Imprisoned Star</color> that increases Glaciation DMG by <color=#D91414>5%</color> instead. When there are Ice Spikes, Cecily's Cipher Attacks will accumulate extra <color=#D91414>200</color> Congelation for the team instead.</color>

Name: Infinite Chord
Intro:
[Core Passive - Echoing Twins] New Effect: Glaciation.
Some of the skills can fill the <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>. When the gauge is full, consume it to cast <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>. Casting certain skills will consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG to nearby enemies. While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals additional Glaciation DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, they will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal Glaciation DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. The <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>, <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> can transfer to the next character with Effect: Glaciation.
- At <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>, casts <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG and generate <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color>. Max <color=#D91414>10 Layers</color>.
- When having more than <color=#D91414>0</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, certain skills can consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>180%</color> Glaciation DMG. When forming <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, every <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color> consumed will extend their duration by <color=#D91414>1</color>s.
- While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area and gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. This can only trigger <color=#D91414>once</color> every <color=#D91414>0.25</color>s.
- When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, it will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area. For every <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> owned, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> increases by <color=#D91414>9%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>10000</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>.
When Judgment Zone is not expanded, press and hold Dodge to make Echo shoot an Ice Arrow, dealing <color=#D91414>988.24%</color> Glaciation DMG, and expand an <color=#D91414>8</color>-second Congelation Zone. In the Congelation Zone, at Max Splendor Points, press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo spend all Splendor Points and cast Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike (During this process, Echo will become Invincible and this cannot be interrupted by [Signature - Celestial Edge]), imprisoning the nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>2964.71%</color> Glaciation DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>50 Signature Energy</color> to herself, and activating all available QTEs.
Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike will consume all Cipher Orbs, a maximum equal number of Signal Orbs, and the Soul Shatter Mark (if available) to enhance Effect: Glaciation accordingly.
- Each Cipher Orb will increase the Base DMG of Arctic Ice and Ice Spikes by <color=#D91414>4%</color>. Each Signal Orb will increase the Base DMG of Ice Accumulation by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>24</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. The Soul Shatter Mark will enhance the effect caused by Congelation. Every 100 Congelation will increase the Base DMG of the next Ice Burst by <color=#D91414>200%</color> (cannot be stacked).
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — When there are Ice Spikes, Echo will reset their duration to <color=#D91414>10</color>s when casting [Signature - Celestial Edge]. [QTE - Advent of Justice] will prolong their duration by <color=#D91414>4</color>s and deal <color=#D91414>600%</color> Glaciation DMG instead. Cecily will deal extra <color=#D91414>200%</color> Glaciation DMG and accumulate extra <color=#D91414>100</color> Congelation for the team when launching a Cipher Attack.
- Ice Spikes last no longer than <color=#D91414>10</color>s.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — Base DMG of Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike, Imprisoning Co-Strike, and Soulbreaking Co-Strike increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>.
New effect of [Passive - Decisive Omen Lv.2] added: The final effect of <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> inflicted by [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] increases by <color=#D91414>5%</color>. If the Congelation Mark is activated, If the Congelation Mark is activated, then applies <color=#D91414>Imprisoned Star</color> that increases Glaciation DMG by <color=#D91414>5%</color> instead. When there are Ice Spikes, Cecily's Cipher Attacks will accumulate extra <color=#D91414>200</color> Congelation for the team instead.</color>

In the Congelation Zone, at Max Splendor Points, press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo spend all Splendor Points and cast Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike (During this process, Echo will become Invincible and this cannot be interrupted by [Signature - Celestial Edge]), imprisoning the nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>3247.06%</color> Glaciation DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>50 Signature Energy</color> to herself, and activating all available QTEs.
Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike will consume all Cipher Orbs, a maximum equal number of Signal Orbs, and the Soul Shatter Mark (if available) to enhance Effect: Glaciation accordingly.
- Each Cipher Orb will increase the Base DMG of Arctic Ice and Ice Spikes by <color=#D91414>4%</color>. Each Signal Orb will increase the Base DMG of Ice Accumulation by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>24</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. The Soul Shatter Mark will enhance the effect caused by Congelation. Every 100 Congelation will increase the Base DMG of the next Ice Burst by <color=#D91414>200%</color> (cannot be stacked).
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — When there are Ice Spikes, Echo will reset their duration to <color=#D91414>10</color>s when casting [Signature - Celestial Edge]. [QTE - Advent of Justice] will prolong their duration by <color=#D91414>4</color>s and deal <color=#D91414>600%</color> Glaciation DMG instead. Cecily will deal extra <color=#D91414>200%</color> Glaciation DMG and accumulate extra <color=#D91414>100</color> Congelation for the team when launching a Cipher Attack.
- Ice Spikes last no longer than <color=#D91414>10</color>s.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — Base DMG of Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike, Imprisoning Co-Strike, and Soulbreaking Co-Strike increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>.
New effect of [Passive - Decisive Omen Lv.2] added: The final effect of <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> inflicted by [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] increases by <color=#D91414>5%</color>. If the Congelation Mark is activated, If the Congelation Mark is activated, then applies <color=#D91414>Imprisoned Star</color> that increases Glaciation DMG by <color=#D91414>5%</color> instead. When there are Ice Spikes, Cecily's Cipher Attacks will accumulate extra <color=#D91414>200</color> Congelation for the team instead.</color>

Name: Infinite Chord
Intro:
[Core Passive - Echoing Twins] New Effect: Glaciation.
Some of the skills can fill the <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>. When the gauge is full, consume it to cast <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG and gaining <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>. Casting certain skills will consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing Glaciation DMG to nearby enemies. While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals additional Glaciation DMG and gains <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, they will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal Glaciation DMG based on the current <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. The <color=#D91414>Glaciation Gauge</color>, <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> and <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> can transfer to the next character with Effect: Glaciation.
- At <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Glaciation Value</color>, casts <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG and generate <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color>. Max <color=#D91414>10 Layers</color>.
- When having more than <color=#D91414>0</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, certain skills can consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>180%</color> Glaciation DMG. When forming <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, every <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color> consumed will extend their duration by <color=#D91414>1</color>s.
- While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area and gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. This can only trigger <color=#D91414>once</color> every <color=#D91414>0.25</color>s.
- When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, it will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area. For every <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> owned, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> increases by <color=#D91414>9%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>10000</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>.

- When having more than <color=#D91414>0</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color>, certain skills can consume all <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layers</color> to form <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, dealing <color=#D91414>180%</color> Glaciation DMG. When forming <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color>, every <color=#D91414>1</color> <color=#D91414>Arctic Ice Layer</color> consumed will extend their duration by <color=#D91414>1</color>s.
- While <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> persist, dealing Glaciation DMG will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Accumulation</color>, which deals <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area and gains <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>. This can only trigger <color=#D91414>once</color> every <color=#D91414>0.25</color>s.
- When <color=#D91414>Ice Spikes</color> expire, it will trigger <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> to deal <color=#D91414>100%</color> Glaciation DMG in a large area. For every <color=#D91414>100</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color> owned, the Base DMG of <color=#D91414>Ice Burst</color> increases by <color=#D91414>9%</color>, up to <color=#D91414>10000</color> <color=#D91414>Congelation</color>.
When Judgment Zone is not expanded, press and hold Dodge to make Echo shoot an Ice Arrow, dealing <color=#D91414>1200%</color> Glaciation DMG, and expand an <color=#D91414>8</color>-second Congelation Zone. In the Congelation Zone, at Max Splendor Points, press and hold Basic Attack to make Echo spend all Splendor Points and cast Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike (During this process, Echo will become Invincible and this cannot be interrupted by [Signature - Celestial Edge]), imprisoning the nearby enemies, dealing <color=#D91414>3600%</color> Glaciation DMG, restoring <color=#D91414>50 Signature Energy</color> to herself, and activating all available QTEs.
Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike will consume all Cipher Orbs, a maximum equal number of Signal Orbs, and the Soul Shatter Mark (if available) to enhance Effect: Glaciation accordingly.
- Each Cipher Orb will increase the Base DMG of Arctic Ice and Ice Spikes by <color=#D91414>4%</color>. Each Signal Orb will increase the Base DMG of Ice Accumulation by <color=#D91414>25%</color> for <color=#D91414>24</color>s. Duration resets every time it is triggered. The Soul Shatter Mark will enhance the effect caused by Congelation. Every 100 Congelation will increase the Base DMG of the next Ice Burst by <color=#D91414>200%</color> (cannot be stacked).
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — When there are Ice Spikes, Echo will reset their duration to <color=#D91414>10</color>s when casting [Signature - Celestial Edge]. [QTE - Advent of Justice] will prolong their duration by <color=#D91414>4</color>s and deal <color=#D91414>600%</color> Glaciation DMG instead. Cecily will deal extra <color=#D91414>200%</color> Glaciation DMG and accumulate extra <color=#D91414>100</color> Congelation for the team when launching a Cipher Attack.
- Ice Spikes last no longer than <color=#D91414>10</color>s.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — Base DMG of Frosty Sorrow Co-Strike, Imprisoning Co-Strike, and Soulbreaking Co-Strike increases by <color=#D91414>50%</color>.
New effect of [Passive - Decisive Omen Lv.2] added: The final effect of <color=#D91414>Ultralimit Torque</color> inflicted by [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] increases by <color=#D91414>5%</color>. If the Congelation Mark is activated, If the Congelation Mark is activated, then applies <color=#D91414>Imprisoned Star</color> that increases Glaciation DMG by <color=#D91414>5%</color> instead. When there are Ice Spikes, Cecily's Cipher Attacks will accumulate extra <color=#D91414>200</color> Congelation for the team instead.</color>

Name: Dark Icethorns
Intro:
In Congelation Zone, [Core Passive - Swift Archery] instead deals <color=#D91414>80%</color> Glaciation DMG, restores <color=#D91414>20 Signature Energy</color> and <color=#D91414>30</color> Splendor Points to Echo, and enters 4 Cipher Orbs for Cecily. Then, follows up with Freezing Rain, dealing <color=#D91414>120%</color> Glaciation DMG.
- Echo can cast [Core Passive - Swift Archery] up to 6 times every time after expanding a Congelation Zone.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Base DMG of [Core Passive - Swift Archery] and Freezing Rain increases by 100%.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Base DMG of Sinbreaker's Arrow increases by 100%. Echo restores 16 Signature Energy and 60 Splendor Points every time when casting this for the first time after entering the battlefield.
New effect of [Passive - Mark of Libra Lv.2] added: The final effect of Ultralimit Torque inflicted by [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] increases by 5%. If the Congelation Mark is activated, If the Congelation Mark is activated, then applies Imprisoned Star that increases Glaciation DMG by 5% instead. When Congelation Zone is active, Echo gains a 30% Extra DMG Bonus.</color>

Name: Judgmental Apocalypse
Intro:
In Congelation Zone, [Signature - Celestial Edge] instead deals <color=#D91414>1600%</color> Glaciation DMG and activates a <color=#D91414>15</color>-second Congelation Mark. Duration resets every time it is triggered or when Echo exits the battlefield. When there are Ice Spikes, the Congelation Mark will be regarded as activated.
When the Congelation Mark is activated, [Class Skill - Amplifier] will grant Ice DMG boost instead, and [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] will grant <color=#D91414>Frost Crystal</color> that provides the same amount of Ice DMG boost.

Intro:
In Congelation Zone, [Signature - Celestial Edge] instead deals <color=#D91414>3388.24%</color> Glaciation DMG and activates a <color=#D91414>15</color>-second Congelation Mark. Duration resets every time it is triggered or when Echo exits the battlefield. When there are Ice Spikes, the Congelation Mark will be regarded as activated.
When the Congelation Mark is activated, [Class Skill - Amplifier] will grant Ice DMG boost instead, and [Core Passive - Blessing of Fortitude] will grant <color=#D91414>Frost Crystal</color> that provides the same amount of Ice DMG boost.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Spending Soul Shatter Mark will increase the Base DMG of the next [Signature - Celestial Edge] by <color=#D91414>50%</color> (cannot be stacked).
After casting [Signature - Celestial Edge], Echo enters 2 Cipher Orbs for Cecily and leaves Melting Snow behind, restoring HP equal to <color=#D91414>21.18%</color> of Echo's ATK every second to allies within it for <color=#D91414>12</color>s.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — In Congelation Zone, Echo deals <color=#D91414>105.88%</color> Glaciation DMG every second to nearby enemies. In Judgment Zone, Echo deals <color=#D91414>105.88%</color> Physical DMG every second to nearby enemies.
New effect of [Passive - Dreamer's Shore Lv.3] added: Echo gains a <color=#D91414>30%</color> Extra DMG Bonus when either zone is expanded.</color>

Name: Darkflame Invasion
Intro:
[Core Passive - Veteran's Reflex] New Effect: [Darkflow]:
For every <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve, gain 1 Darkflow stack, up to a maximum of 15. The character gains a Darkflow Aura based on the current number of stacks, dealing a small amount of Darkflow DMG over time to enemies and reducing their HP recovery. When the number of stacks reaches a threshold, the aura upgrades, increasing its range and dealing a large amount of Darkflow DMG to enemies within the area.
- At <color=#D91414>1/3/6/10/15</color> stacks: Deals <color=#D91414>100%/200%/400%/800%/1600%</color> Darkflow DMG, then deals <color=#D91414>20%/40%/60%/80%/100%</color> Darkflow DMG per second, reducing enemy HP recovery by <color=#D91414>10%/20%/30%/50%/100%</color>.
Press and hold Signature to cast [Signature - Core Awakening], enter the [Corvus Covenant] status, and gain [Dark Morph]. [Dark Morph] is removed upon re-entering the battlefield.
Deals <color=#D91414>240%</color> Darkflow DMG to nearby enemies upon entering the [Corvus Covenant] status. While [Corvus Covenant] is active, Thermal Erosion deals <color=#D91414>480%</color> Darkflow DMG instead.

<color=#645F5D>· Lv.9 — While [Corvus Covenant] is active, each use of [Thermal Erosion] grants an additional 200 Darkflow Reserve.</color>

<color=#645F5D>· Lv.18 — Extra DMG Bonus of [Thermal Erosion] increases by 10%. New Effect of [Passive - Onslaught Lv.2]: Gains one extra Blaze Orb upon casting Flaming Bombardment for the first time after entering the Assault Mode.</color>

For every <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve, gain 1 Darkflow stack, up to a maximum of 15. The character gains a Darkflow Aura based on the current number of stacks, dealing a small amount of Darkflow DMG over time to enemies and reducing their HP recovery. When the number of stacks reaches a threshold, the aura upgrades, increasing its range and dealing a large amount of Darkflow DMG to enemies within the area.
- At <color=#D91414>1/3/6/10/15</color> stacks: Deals <color=#D91414>100%/200%/400%/800%/1600%</color> Darkflow DMG, then deals <color=#D91414>20%/40%/60%/80%/100%</color> Darkflow DMG per second, reducing enemy HP recovery by <color=#D91414>10%/20%/30%/50%/100%</color>.
Press and hold Signature to cast [Signature - Core Awakening], enter the [Corvus Covenant] status, and gain [Dark Morph]. [Dark Morph] is removed upon re-entering the battlefield.
Deals <color=#D91414>480%</color> Darkflow DMG to nearby enemies upon entering the [Corvus Covenant] status. While [Corvus Covenant] is active, Thermal Erosion deals <color=#D91414>960%</color> Darkflow DMG instead.

<color=#0F70BC>· Lv.9 — While [Corvus Covenant] is active, each use of [Thermal Erosion] grants an additional <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve.</color>

<color=#0F70BC>· Lv.18 — Extra DMG Bonus of [Thermal Erosion] increases by 10%. New Effect of [Passive - Onslaught Lv.2]: Gains one extra Blaze Orb upon casting Flaming Bombardment for the first time after entering the Assault Mode.</color>

<color=#0F70BC>· Lv.9 — While [Corvus Covenant] is active, each use of [Thermal Erosion] grants an additional <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve.</color>

<color=#0F70BC>· Lv.18 — Extra DMG Bonus of [Thermal Erosion] increases by 10%. New Effect of [Passive - Onslaught Lv.2]: Gains one extra Blaze Orb upon casting Flaming Bombardment for the first time after entering the Assault Mode.</color>

Name: Darkflame Invasion
Intro:
[Core Passive - Veteran's Reflex] New Effect: [Darkflow]:
For every <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve, gain 1 Darkflow stack, up to a maximum of 15. The character gains a Darkflow Aura based on the current number of stacks, dealing a small amount of Darkflow DMG over time to enemies and reducing their HP recovery. When the number of stacks reaches a threshold, the aura upgrades, increasing its range and dealing a large amount of Darkflow DMG to enemies within the area.
- At <color=#D91414>1/3/6/10/15</color> stacks: Deals <color=#D91414>100%/200%/400%/800%/1600%</color> Darkflow DMG, then deals <color=#D91414>20%/40%/60%/80%/100%</color> Darkflow DMG per second, reducing enemy HP recovery by <color=#D91414>10%/20%/30%/50%/100%</color>.
Press and hold Signature to cast [Signature - Core Awakening], enter the [Corvus Covenant] status, and gain [Dark Morph]. [Dark Morph] is removed upon re-entering the battlefield.
Deals <color=#D91414>705.88%</color> Darkflow DMG to nearby enemies upon entering the [Corvus Covenant] status. While [Corvus Covenant] is active, Thermal Erosion deals <color=#D91414>1411.76%</color> Darkflow DMG instead.

<color=#0F70BC>· Lv.9 — While [Corvus Covenant] is active, each use of [Thermal Erosion] grants an additional <color=#D91414>200</color> Darkflow Reserve.</color>

<color=#0F70BC>· Lv.18 — Extra DMG Bonus of [Thermal Erosion] increases by 10%. New Effect of [Passive - Onslaught Lv.2]: Gains one extra Blaze Orb upon casting Flaming Bombardment for the first time after entering the Assault Mode.</color>

Name: Incinerating Firestorm
Intro:
Base DMG of 3-Ping increases by <color=#D91414>15%</color>.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — When there is [Dark Transformation], Watanabe: Epitaph will inflict Infernal Finality that reduces the target's Darkflow Resistance by 40% instead of Scorching Invasion that reduces the target's Fire Resistance.</color>

Base DMG of 3-Ping increases by <color=#D91414>37.06%</color>.
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — When there is [Dark Transformation], Watanabe: Epitaph will inflict <color=#D91414>Infernal Finality</color> that reduces the target's Darkflow Resistance by <color=#D91414>40%</color> instead of <color=#D91414>Scorching Invasion</color> that reduces the target's Fire Resistance.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — [QTE - Pincer Intimidation] will trigger [Firepower Bulwark] that drops a bigger fire ring. New Effect of [Passive - Siege Break Lv.1]: <color=#D91414>Infernal Finality's</color> effect increases by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. New Effect of [Passive - Siege Break Lv.2]: <color=#D91414>Infernal Finality's</color> effect increases by <color=#D91414>10%</color>. Gains 2 extra stacks of Thermal Superconductivity when parries for the first time after entering the battlefield.</color>

Name: Purgatorial Breakthrough
Intro:
During [Raven's Contract], [Signature - Explosive Purge] deals <color=#D91414>720%</color> Darkflow DMG instead.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9 — Exiting the Assault Mode will convert each [Blaze Orb] to a random set of Signal Orbs.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18 — Immediately gains 12 Signature Energy upon entering the battlefield. New Effect of [Passive - Leader's Wings Lv.3]: Extra DMG Bonus of [Signature - Explosive Purge] increases by 10%.</color>

<color=#0F70BC>Lv.9 — Exiting the Assault Mode will convert each [Blaze Orb] to a random set of Signal Orbs.</color>
 
<color=#0F70BC>Lv.18 — Immediately gains 12 Signature Energy upon entering the battlefield. New Effect of [Passive - Leader's Wings Lv.3]: Extra DMG Bonus of [Signature - Explosive Purge] increases by 10%.</color>

Name: Ascendant Overlook
Intro:
Press and hold Dodge to enter [Reaping Moon], creating a giant black hole during the charging period that automatically consumes up to 2 sets of 3-Ping Signal Orbs. For each set consumed, gains <color=#D91414>10</color> Crescent Points and deals <color=#D91414>350%</color> Nihil DMG to nearby enemies. Consumed 3-Ping Signal Orbs cannot grant Eclipse Points. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction during this period. Cannot recover Dodge Gauge. When attacked, triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Release Dodge to cast [Shattering Moon], smashing the black hole down and dealing an additional <color=#D91414>700%</color> Nihil DMG to enemies.
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.9: After entering [Reaping Moon] by pressing and holding Dodge, Signal Orbs are rearranged into 3-Pings. When attacked during this period, gains 1 Signal Orb.</color>
 
<color=#645F5D>Lv.18: Crescent Points gained from 3-Ping Signal Orbs consumed during [Reaping Moon] increases to 27 points, and grants 15 Eclipse Points.
New Effect of [Passive - Nebular Composition Lv.2] added: After casting [Lunar Downfall] and exiting the battlefield in both [Main Sequence] and [Finality] respectively, enters [Overlook] state, launching an attack against nearby enemies every 2s, dealing 4000% Nihil DMG. Exits [Overlook] state after 4 attacks.</color>

New Effect of [Passive - Nebular Composition Lv.2] added: After casting [Lunar Downfall] and exiting the battlefield in both [Main Sequence] and [Finality] respectively, enters [Overlook] state, launching an attack against nearby enemies every <color=#D91414>2</color>s, dealing <color=#D91414>4000%</color> Nihil DMG. Exits [Overlook] state after <color=#D91414>4</color> attacks.</color>

Name: Ascendant Overlook
Intro:
Press and hold Dodge to enter [Reaping Moon], creating a giant black hole during the charging period that automatically consumes up to 2 sets of 3-Ping Signal Orbs. For each set consumed, gains <color=#D91414>10</color> Crescent Points and deals <color=#D91414>720.59%</color> Nihil DMG to nearby enemies. Consumed 3-Ping Signal Orbs cannot grant Eclipse Points. Gains Super Armor and <color=#D91414>50%</color> DMG Reduction during this period. Cannot recover Dodge Gauge. When attacked, triggers Matrix if it is not on cooldown. Release Dodge to cast [Shattering Moon], smashing the black hole down and dealing an additional <color=#D91414>1441.18%</color> Nihil DMG to enemies.

Name: String Moonfall
